Too Old To Go. Nicky and her sister Jimmy had waited their whole life to take a trip. They decided to go visit their cousins in upstate New York. They set out from New Mexico in their fancy motor coach. It wasn't long before the sisters realized they were too old travel. With hurting backs and numb backsides they headed home.
Fried Chicken. James loved fried chicken. He decided to cook some one day. He bought all the ingredients. He also bought a large frier. It was the best fried chicken ever.

Steve and His Cats. Steve rescued four kittens from the alley in back of his apartment. He had to bottle feed them because they were very young. He has taken care of these cats for over two years. Steve loves them very much and would be very sad if one of them died. Steve plans on taking care of them for the rest of their lives.

Retirement fund. I just opened a retirement fund at work. They will match whatever I put into it. I figure I can save a lot of money in the next few years. I have to make sure to keep watch of it. I know the stocks can go up and down a lot.

Trash in the Closet. Jessica was having money trouble. She was forced to forgo trash service to pay other bills. In the meantime she began storing her trash in a closet. Soon the closet was full of trash and stank badly. Finally when Jessica was able to pay her bill she cleaned it out.

The Lollipop. The kids loved sugar. They were eating a giant lollipop. They finished it off in about an hour. Then they ran around the house screaming. Their mom knew they shouldn't have had that much sugar!

afloat. Karn always wanted a boat. She thought why not rent one and experience boat ownership. She went out on the lake to have fun. Karn was driving with lots of speed and she flipped the boat. As she swam to shore she thought about how complicated wanting can be.

Home Run. William was a professional baseball player. He hit a homerun out of the park. His ball hit a car out in the parking lot. The ball cracked the windshield. It turned out William had broken his own car's windshield!

Bend To My Metal Will. Bob was measuring the length of his truck bed with a tape measure. The tape measure got stuck on something in the truck. Bob yanked it harder than he should have. The tape measure twisted and bent on itself. Bob threw it away when he couldn't retract it.

Taco Tuesday. Fetty has been in Italy for over a year. He loves italian food, but lately has tired of it. He misses the delicious mexican food he has back home, in California. One day he goes to the grocery store and buys supplies for tacos. All of his friends join him for Taco Tuesday.
Dishes. The man did the dishes. He put the dishes away. His wife got out a plate. The plate was dirty to her. The wife re-washed all of the dishes.
Delivering the baby. Rosie started having contractions. She was right at her due date. She felt immense pain. Her husband rushed to her side. He took her to the hospital.
Band. Benny likes music. He decided to learn to play the trumpet. His school band needed more trumpet players. Benny joined his school band. He is very happy with his decision.

The Bar. Kelsey and her friends decided to meet up. They went to a bar they hadn't been to in years. It was run down and dumpy. They immediately decided to go elsewhere. The friends were sad the bar was no longer a nice place.

Hail Mary. The home football team was down a touchdown. There was only a few seconds left on the clock. The team was buried deep in their own backfield. The coach called a last minute play. The hail mary pass was caught, and the home team won.

Beauty and The Beast. Jerod took his girlfriend to Disneyland. They wore matching shirts. Everyone kept stopping them to comment on their shirts. They sent me a picture of them looking at Cinderella's Castle. Their shirts were of Beauty and The Beast.

Child support. Ava was excited to finally get child support for her kids. Her first payment was twice as much as expected. She was excited she went clothes shopping with the money. The next payment she did not get because of the overpayment. Ava wished she would have spent the money more wisely.

The Baseball Game. Boris had a baseball game coming up. It was his first game ever. Boris was terrified. But, he continued to train hard and focus on winning. His team won the game because Boris hit the winning home run.

It Was Supposed To Be Their Apartment, Not Just His. Ryan and his girlfriend spent almost all their time together, in love. They decided to get an apartment together to save money. She quickly became unhappy, and ended things, to Ryan's surprise. She asked him to sign her off the lease, or there'd be no hope at all. He signed, hoping to patch things up, and he never saw her again.

Winter Storm. It was a particularly cold winter this year. There was a storm that knocked out power for blocks. Luckily the Waltons prepared. They had plenty of food and heaters. They weathered the storm well.

Into the abyss. The cave explorer turned on his flashlight and went deeper in. He tripped over a rock and dropped his light. The light fell on the ground and broke. The cave explorer felt around in the dark for his spare. He couldn't find it and had to crawl out of the cave.

Christmas Problems. Faye needed to get the Christmas tree into the living room. She tried to shove it through the front door. Next, she attempted to pull it through the back door. She then took a large rope and tied it as tight as she could. Faye is now enjoying eggnog while decorating the tree.

Putting the Cat Down. My daughter's friend in middle and high school lives in CA. She used to live in MA. She came by to visit last week. Her mom had to put their 17-year old cat down. She posted a tribute on FB.

The Brown Bag. Lucy found a small brown bag in a shopping cart. She picked the bag up and carried it inside the store Lucy gave the bag to the store manager. The store manager and Lucy looked inside the bag together. The brown bag was full of rocks.

Pig Eye. We went to a pig roast in 2009. The hosts served a whole roasted pig. I offered to give $5 to anyone who would eat the pig's eyes. Two teenagers ate the eyes. I was surprised as I handed out the money.

Baking. Jenny wanted to try her hand at baking. She started with pre-made cookie dough. Pre-made cookies tasted good so she decided to try it from scratch. A breeze came in and turned the page in the recipe book she was using. The cookies were terrible, so she vowed never to bake again.
Tacos. Everyone at work loves Taco Tuesday. They cannot get enough tacos. Their love of tacos makes them more productive. This makes for a great atmosphere at work. Productivity has gone up.

Lorraine Makes her Bed. Lorraine usually wakes up and leaves her bed unmade. However, she hates coming home to an unmade bed at night. One morning she takes the time to make her bed before leaving home. When she gets home that night she is happy to see her bed made up. She decides to make her bed every morning.

Timmy Loves to Dance. Little Timmy always felt different. He never understood why all the other boys didn't like him. He just wanted friends. He just wanted someone to hang out with. But more than that he wanted to dance.

Over Sleepy. Dan overslept this morning. When he finally logged in all the work was gone. Dan decided today would be a day of playing video games. He set up his console and got to work playing. He played late into the night and overslept again the next day.

The Cheeseburger addict. Cindy loved to eat double cheeseburgers every day of her life. She would wake up and eat cheeseburgers and went to sleep eating them. She was a heavy person but it did not stop her from eating burgers. One day she had a massive heart attack and was sent to the hospital. She did not survive and died the next day due to her nasty lifestyle.

Grapes. Melanie wanted to grow fruit for her family. She tried to plant berry bushes, but long vines strangled them! She tried growing an apple tree, but the vibes covered that too. Then, in the fall, the vibes began to droop with round orbs. Melanie had grown hundreds of grapes for her family!

The Work Event. Kim's job was having an event at a local restaurant. They closed the office and everyone walked there in groups. Management went on and on about ethics and making the company better. The event was boring but Kim stayed anyway. After Kim left thinking it was all lip service, but hoped for change.

Food network star. Ronnie was excited to be in the top two. He made sure his last dish was his greatest. When the judges came to judge they chose Ronnie. Ronnie couldn't be more happier. He started jumping for joy.

Sleazy. I was in a drive thru yesterday. I was waiting in line alone in my van. A weird man came up to my window. He started knocking and I got scared. I pretended to make a phone call so he would leave.

The new show. I heard there is a new show coming to television. It is supposed to be another reality show. It actually looks really good. I think I may take the night off to watch it. I'll tell you how it was.

Sue's Trip. Sue decided she wanted to go on a vacation with her family. She talked to her boss about getting two weeks off of work. Her boss granted her a paid vacation. Sue took her family to Tahiti. They all had a great time!

The Broken Toy Box. Greg was in his room playing. He wanted to see out the window but was too short. He dumped his toys out of the bin they were in. Then he turned the bin over and tried to stand on it. Unfortunately the plastic snapped under his weight.

Pizza Place. Angela saw coupons for a new pizza place at work. She had never been there but heard good things. The coupon was for a free pizza. Angela decided to take a coupon and try it after work. Angela and her family did not like the pizza.

Missing. I standing in line at the movie theater. I looked around at all the happy couples around me. I started to feel so lonely that I walked back to my car. I listened to some songs about love. I drove to where my wife was buried.

Signing up for a library card. Adam wanted to get a new library card. First, he had to provide proof of his address. He searched through a box of junk mail. Finally, he found an official letter with his address. He turned it in and was able to get his card.

Stripped down. I was working at a local strip club. I was very ashamed and wanted no one to know. One night I was working, there was a class reunion celebrating there. I soon realized it was my high school reunion. I hid in the changing room all night as to not be discovered.

The Big Win. Jason grew up riding motorcycles. He won his first motorcycle race at the age of 13. He kept racing and improving. Kawasaki sponsored him at the age of seventeen. Jason said that gave him to confidence to win the motocross.

A visit to Grandma. Toni went to see her Grandma. It was her Grandma's 70th birthday. Toni took her a present of some flowers. Grandma loved the flowers. She put them in a vase and had a very happy birthday.

Always do Your Homework. An American read the story of King Arthur. He decided to fly to Britain and try to pull the sword from the stone. Upon arriving and making inquiries, he was told that it was a legend. Succession is defined by descent from Sophia, Electress of Hanover. The American regretted not doing more research before buying a ticket.

Picking a Movie. Tom and his wife were watching Netflix. They were trying to pick a movie. Neither could agree on anything. They kept scrolling through all the options. After a while they decided to just go to sleep instead.
Video Games. Bill and Joe were playing a video game. Bill beat Joe at the game. Joe was upset and being a poor sport. Joe threw down the controller. Bill quit playing games with Joe.
Lost remote. Fred could not find the television remote. He looked everywhere for it. He searched his house like crazy. Finally Fred found it under his pillow. Fred was relieved.

Itching. Sophie woke up that day with a terrible itch. It was so severe that she went to the doctor. The doctor examined her but said nothing was wrong with her. Sophie who knew how bad it was went home. She put lemon juice over her itch and was instantly relieved.

Bracketology. My sons did an experiment with their NCAA brackets this year. One son chose games based on the strength of the teams. The other chose games based on the number of letters in their names. The tournament played out and we were shocked at the results. My son with the letter strategy won by a huge margin.

The Man Across the Street. One day, I decided to check the mail. I walked to my mailbox in front of my house. I noticed a man dressed strangely across the street. When I went back inside, I watched him through the window. The man went back indoors after cutting his grass.

Catfishing. Daniella was catfishing guys on the internet. She pretended to be this cute Norwegian girl. In reality, she was overweight and not very attractive. One day, someone figured out her true identity. They told the forum who she was and she lost all her friends.

Unlucky Good-Luck Charm. Jenny was looking for her binoculars when she found the necklace. She had wanted to see which boy was talking to the new girl next door. The four-leaf clover necklace was a gift from her ex-boyfriend, Bob. After reminiscing, she found the binoculars and peeked out the window. The boy in her neighbor's driveway was Rob!
Lion. The lion escaped the zoo. People tried to find it. It was in a dumpster. They tranquilized it. The zookeepers fixed the cage for the lion.

Homeless Heart. I had gotten fired from my Job. My phone was dead, and I couldn't use it. My day was going horrible. I ended up talking to a homeless man who was sitting nearby. He was the best listener I've ever ran across.

Moving Up. Rob was really hoping to work on a new important project. Rob asked his boss about the opportunity. His boss said he'd think about it. After a week, Rob's boss called him into his office. Rob got the new position!

Comedian Carrie. Carrie is a vulgar comedian. Her acts draw laughs and protests from the crowd. A heckler frustrates Carrie and she says offensive things. The crowd is offended and leaves. Carrie is no longer a comedian.

Big Day. Max and Lana's big day was coming up. They were getting married in two days. Lana was very stressed out and Max was nervous. They ran around nonstop attending to last minute details. When the time came they had the most wonderful wedding.

Carlos Meets a Girl. Carlos has been single for several Year's. One day Carlos and his friend Dan go to a dance club. Carlos meets a nice girl there and they exchange phone numbers. The next week they go out for a cup of coffee. Carlos hopes he has finally met someone he can love.

Olson Opposes Octopus. Olson was not very adventurous when it came to food. He had never tried sushi before. His friend started easing him into it, making recommendation. He tried a few pieces and enjoyed most of them. He drew the line at octopus and refused to try it.

Used Music Store. I went to a used music store to look through the CDs they had. Because they sold used music, many of their CDs were old. This was great for me, because I like obscure music. After a long time of searching, I found a CD I loved. It was a great idea to go to the store.

Fred. Fred was going to make sure he didn't end up like his dad. His dad abused his mom and never provided for his family. Fred found a good job and got married. He supported his family and never abused them. Fred was proud of his own accomplishments.
The Bad Attitude. There was a boy name Zaiden. Zaiden was being very temperamental. He was so tired. He laid down for a nap. When Zaiden woke up he was in a much better mood.
Sad story. Robbie was confused by his homework. He asked his mom for help. His mom told Robbie to ask his father. His father told him he was busy. Robbie felt lonely and sat down to cry.

Repaying the Pastor. Pastor Brown lived next door. One year there was a terrible snowstorm. It was easier for him to stay in than to risk his health shoveling. I hated seeing him stuck so I decided to help. It took all day but I finally cleared his steps and driveway.

Writer. Molly had always dreamed of writing a novel. She started writing one the year she turned 30. It took a lot of research and time to put it all together. Finally it was finished. Molly's dream came true when her book got published.

The Lost Dog. One day Rowland took the horse out and Penelope, the dog, followed. Rowland rode the horse out to the lonely places. Penelope and Rowland could hear coyotes howling in the distance. When Roland came back, his father asked him, where's the dog? He went out and found Penelope on top of an old rusted car, howling!

Birds. Timmy loved to look at birds. Lately he had walked down the street and seen hundreds of them. They were bright red and flew in a big flock. Timmy read that these birds were migratory. Surely enough, the very next week he didn't see a single red bird.

The Bridge. Elizabeth was out for a stroll. She found a beautiful bridge. She decided to cross it. She walked across and looked at the beautiful water below her. This bridge was peaceful and beautiful.

Sam Walks the Dog. One day Sam took his dog Bella out for a walk. Bella pulled and pulled on the leash. Sam couldn't hold Bella anymore and she broke away running. Sam chased Bella for 30 minutes before he finally caught her. Sam will not be taking Bella for another walk anytime soon!
Bad sale. I went to the mall yesterday. I thought there was a sale. So I showed up at the store. There was no sale. I was so upset.

theater. Ann got a summer job at the movie theater. She hated working during the weekend. But then she found out about the perks of her job. Every month she could see a free movie! Ann was pleased with her benefit!
Sandy's Allergies. Sandy had bad allergies. She was cleaning her house. Sandy dusted her fans and baseboards. They were very dusty. Sandy began to sneeze and had watery eyes.

Hospital Visit. I went to the hospital for pain in my right foot. I thought the pain was due to damaged nerves in my foot. I sat in pain as I waited in the lobby. The doctor called me in, looked me over and examined my foot. The problem was a simple one that was remedied with a pain medicine.

Fear Returns. Gina's family wasn't staying in Illinois. She was more than pleased to find this out. All she had to do was wait for her parents to drive them back home. But Gina wasn't a patient person. Before long, the fear they were never leaving began to return.

Drawing Class. Joy was taking a figure drawing class at the local community college. Today they were working on male anatomy with a live model. The students stood around a platform waiting for the model to arrive. Then her brother Joe walked in! Fortunately he was able to keep his shorts on for the class.

Carmen Plays Softball. Carmen wants to be more active. She decides to join the local softball league. She finds the other players are very friendly. Carmen loves playing with the softball league. Carmen is happy she found a way to be more active.

Jersey. Melo really liked to play sports. His basketball coach recognized his skill. He told Me that he could pick out the team jersey's. Melo decided on neon green jerseys. Now Melo's team is the most colorful team on the court!
The Blog. Anne was a famous blogger. Her blog attracted millions of readers. She wrote about her daily life. She also posted pictures of the clothes she bought. Anne's popularity continued to soar.
Retiring from Teaching. Susan was a teacher. She had been thinking about retiring. Susan had a horrible class one year. She realized she didn't want to teach anymore. Susan finally retired.
Getting Dressed. I went to visit my cousin. My aunt called my cousin downstairs. She said she had to get her bra on. My aunt said she was getting dressed. I thought that was plenty of detail.
Tom's Drink. Tom bought a can of soda at a drive thru. He swerved to miss a raccoon on the road. The cup fell out of the cup holder. The cup fell onto the floor. Tom's drink stained his carpet.

Gertrude Slips. Gertrude brings her skateboard out for a day on the streets. Her father asks her to be careful because it is raining. However, Gertrude slips and falls from her skateboard. The falls bruises her knees and wrists. Gertrude wishes she had taken her father's advice.
Lost Job. Tim had a part time job. It was all he could find. Unfortunately it was at Blockbuster. They shut down and Tim's job was gone. It took him months to find more work.

No Spare. While on my way to work this morning, I got a flat tire. I reached for my cell phone to call triple A. It was then I discovered I had left my cell phone at home. A kind stranger stopped and offered to help. Unfortunately the spare was used on the other side last week.

John Runs Errands. John knows he will feel better if he gets a few things done today. He decides to run some errands. John drops off clothing at the laundromat and goes shopping. When he returns home he feels tired. John is glad he finished doing some things today.
Catching Burglars. John had his things stolen. They broke into his apartment. He checked local pawn shops. He found some of his things at one of them. It helped track down the thieves.

Arra. Arra went to the market for strawberries. But there was such a big selection of fresh fruit! She could not resist buying melons and peaches too. She brought all her finds home in her basket. Arra and her family ate fruit every day for a week!

job interview. It was my first time to have job interview. I don't have any idea what to wear and what to bring. So i decided to search on the internet what are the do's and dont's. So i think i was prepared for the interview. After my interview,someone called me and she said i was hired.

The chicken baby. Zoey was celebrating Easter. She got her kids a bunch of baby chicks as a gift. They loved the chicks and played with them all day. Unfortunately, one of the baby birds died. The kids and Zoey buried it with some nice flowers.

Lary's Lasagna. Lary was taught by his father how to make delicious lasagna. He brought his family secret to America. He sold lasagna on the side of the road. He became rich enough to open his own store! Now he owns multiple restaurants all using his family recipe!

First day of classes. John got up in the morning, all ready for his first class. Before he left, he realized he didn't have his phone. He spent an hour looking for it, but finally gave up. He sprinted to his class, remembering he was late. When he ran in the room, the professor gave him a dirty look.

Bankrupt. Nancy won some money from poker. She felt risky and decided to have another match. She placed all of her money into this game. Her opponent made the first move. He ended up winning and he took all of her money.

Home Away. Sarah loved the house that she and her parents lived in. Their house was next to a busy, crowded road. The government decided to build a bigger road next to the house. They told Sarah's parents that they'd have to sell their house. Sarah was very upset that she was going to lose her childhood home.

Fixing the Sink. The sink in my bathroom broke. I decided that I should fix it myself. After one hour, the sink looked worse than before. I finally decided to call a professional plumber. The plumber fixed the sink in ten minutes.

Too Close. Joseph communicated with the other boat using sonar. In the tiny submarine, he sent out a single ping from the ship. The ping bounced back after a moment. Joseph told the captain that the ship was only 20 feet ahead of them. The captain gasped and they hit the underside of the boat.
The Fire. Erin loved to sleep with candles. One day she took a nap while a candle was lit. The cat knocked it over. She woke to a house full of smoke. Both Erin and the cat got out safely.

Biographies. I love reading biographies of musicians. Last year I went to the library seeking info on Freddie Mercury. I was informed that they would have to order the book from elsewhere. I patiently awaited its arrival. Due to an error, they checked it out to someone else when it arrived.

The busy day. Samantha was very busy during the day. She constantly thought about how to get all her work done. She thought of writing a schedule everyday. She started to write a schedule for her busy day. She felt she can get most of her work done during the day.
Knife. The knife was serrated. She was terrified he would use it on her. She laid down on the floor at his feet. He placed his feet on her head. He screamed at her, but didn't kill her.
Last to the party. Lara was having a birthday party. Everyone showed up except Tina. Finally Tina showed up. When Tina showed up she was the last one. Tina was upset she was late.
Bill's Bar. Bill bought an old bar to renovate. Bill thought nobody would come to his bar. He repainted and furnished it anyways. The bar was packed on opening night! Bill's bar was a success!

Dead Mouse. Mary always took the garbage to the dumpster in the alley. One day she saw a dead mouse rotting near the dumpster. She was so startled, she almost dropped the garbage bags. She brought the garbage bags back into the house. Mary made her husband take the garbage out instead.

The Fishing Pole. Ross went to the sporting goods store. He bought a new fishing pole. He immediately set out to catch some fish. The first day, he caught ten huge bass! He was so pleased with his new pole!

sick day. Kelly woke up with a scratchy throat, headache and cough. She felt dizzy as she tried to get out of bed to get dressed for work. She checked her temperature and found out she had a fever of 101. She called in to her manager who told Kelly to stay home and rest. Kelly then spent the whole day sleeping and drinking gatorade.

The Race. Tony was lined up on the start in his car. The flag waved and he was off. He zoomed around the race track. Each lap he raced he got quicker and quicker. He won the race and easily beat his the other racers.

In The Mitt. Alice put out her cigarette on the oven mitt. She tossed it on the counter next to the stack of mail. Her family sat down to eat the Thanksgiving dinner. Alice suddenly smelled smoke wafting across the room. Her cigarette had started the kitchen on fire!

Coffee. Dana didn't like coffee. Her boyfriend made her a special cup with milk and sugar. She finally tried it, and found she loved it. Now she drinks coffee that way every single day. She's glad she was open to try something new.
The bird flies. Today I saw a baby bird. The bird was in a tree. The mother bird was teaching the baby bird. She dropped the bird out of the nest. The baby bird flew away.

Knee. Pam was playing volleyball at a work picnic. She had played in high school, so she was doing well. She dove for the ball, but landed on her knee funny. It hurt quite badly, so she decided to go to the doctor. Pam had dislocated her knee.

Sandwich. Jean made a peanut butter and jelly sandwich. He ran upstairs for a few minutes and laid his sandwich down. When he came back, it was gone. He looked and around and couldn't figure out where it went. Then he saw his dog licking the jelly.

Rapper. Amy was always into hip hop music. She could rap all her favorite songs. One day she decided to write her own rap. She went to a studio and recorded her own rap original. She uploaded it online and got tons of good feedback.

On set. The lead actress refused to show up. The director panicked. He caught sight of an assistant who looked just like the lead actress. The assistant played the role to perfection. The director was hailed as a genius.

Gusty Winds. The hurricane took place in the city. Randy made sure that his house was prepared. He stocked up on groceries and shutters for his window. Heavy winds blew towards his house. They seeped through the shutters and broke Randy's windows.
Ted buys a car. Teddy was looking for a new car. He decided to head to the dealership. He wanted to pick out the best one for him. He chose the ford mustang. Ted was so happy with his new car.

Kids Chair. Kate wanted to eat cookies. But they were up high. She was too short to reach them. She saw the yellow fisher price kids chairs in the dining room. They were the perfect height for her to reach the cookies.
The Bowling Match. Ken was about to win the bowling tournament. He just needed five more pins. He had two more chances. The first one went right into the gutter. The second was a strike and he won!

The Park at Night. Amy, Lynn, and Kim were at the park. They were supposed to meet some boys from Lynn's block. It was a cool fall night, and they girls were getting cold. After 10 minutes they began to think they weren't coming. Finally they saw 2 of the boys walking towards the park.

Fireworks. Dudley and Jared were always troublemakers. Their teachers feared them and their parents couldn't control them. One day, they stole fireworks from a local shop. They proceeded to go the golf course and set them off. They nearly burned down a few houses, which taught them their lesson.

Magic Kingdom. We were all getting tired after a long day at Magic Kingdom. Rachael wanted to stop at the shops on the way out. We headed towards Main Street, but everyone was ready for fireworks. We decided to skip the shopping and head home. We figured we would be able to come back another day.

Gym Rats. Rand wanted to get in shape. But he didn't have the willpower to work out alone! Then he asked his pal Jasper to join a gym with him. The two guys went every week to work out together. Soon they both had large new muscles!

McDonalds. There was no power in most of south Florida due to a hurricane. There were a few business with generators and power. Kim could see a line of people a block away at McDonalds. Kim walked to McDonalds to see they had power. Kim sat inside for an hour eating ice cream to beat the heat.

The Twins. Gabe had a twin brother named Pete. The two boys were identical. Gabe was doing poorly in his math class. Pete did well in math. Pete took a math exam in place of Gabe so he could pass the course.

A lost day. Marie went to the store to choose a new couch. As she was very indecisive, she stayed there all day. The employees showed her everything they had. But Marie always found something she didn't like. In the end she went home with nothing and had lost her day.

My phone plan. I think I am going to change my wireless carrier. The one I have now is so expensive. I have been looking at other carriers. There are a lot of choices out there. I hope I can find a cheaper one.

Southie. One hot summer day I biked to the beach from work on lunch. I had a pair of trunks at work. I changed into the trunks and went swimming for an hour. I dressed and biked back to work. My coworkers said I was crazy.

Fleas. Last year we got fleas in our house. Fleas bite you and make you itchy. We vacuumed a lot to get rid of the fleas. We also put down salt which is supposed to dehydrate them. Eventually, these things worked and we no longer have fleas.
Good Signs. The man traveled to Indiana. On his way he saw a sign. He turned left where the sign told him. He parked his car. He recommended following signs in the future.

Nick. Nick didn't do well in school as a child. He dropped out of high school. When he grew up he decided to go to college. He worked very hard and made good grades. He graduated from college three years ago.

The Puppy. Sally went to friend's house after work. She brought a puppy with her that someone had left at her work. She told her friend Dan he should take the adorable puppy. After 1 hour with the cute puppy he couldn't resist. The puppy has been in Dan's life for 11 Year's now.

Baseball. I liked to play baseball as a child. I was playing second base in a game at the playground. The strongest girl in the school hit a line drive right at me. It caught me on my right cheek and knocked me on my back! It hurt a lot, but I got up and finished the game.

Sandals. Jane went shopping one day for some sandals. While in the shoe store, she spoke with a clerk who helped her. She picked out some sandals, and the clerk fainted. Another customer saw and called an ambulance. The ambulance came and took the clerk away, and Jane left.

Waffles. Cal was looking forward to eating a bagel with cream cheese. When he opened his fridge, he discovered he had neither ingredient. Pondering what to have for breakfast he searched his freezer. Cal found a ziplock baggie with frozen waffles. He had them for breakfast instead of what he had planned to eat.

Rockstar. Jeff learned how to play guitar at a very young age. He started a band in high school. They practiced very hard daily. Jeff decided to take this to another level. They took the band on tour and became rockstars.

Frozen in Place. Ali was frozen where she stood. Her sister had brought her with to a friends house. The friend's sister was a bully who hated Ali. Ali watched in shock as the bully approached her. Before she knew what happened, they were in a full on fight.

Lost Bird. Angie's pet bird Spot has gotten out of her cage and flown away. Angie posts signs all over town to help her find her bird. Many people call with Spot sightings. Angie checks on each sighting but can't find Spot. Angie is heartbroken that she can't find her bird.

Facebook isn't for everyone. Janae is very active on facebook. But she say's it doesn't make her feel good about herself. She feels that the online relationships are fake and shallow. Janae says she'd rather have face to face relationships. So she deactivated her facebook and swears not to re-activate it.

Let's Party!. Casey decided he wanted to throw a big party. He put together a guest list and sent out invitations. He hired a deejay and they picked out some music choices. The day before the party, Casey bought a ton of food and drinks. The shindig was a terrific success and Casey had a great time.

A Robbery. The gas station I frequent to buy coffee was robbed. I showed up one morning, and as I entered the door I was shoved aside. A man came running out and slammed the door into my face. Before I could collect myself, the clerk came running after. The man was a thief, and he was caught and arrested.

Sandals. Tom loved the summer time. He always wore tennis shoes. He noticed his feet would sweat excessively. One day he bought sandals and began wearing those instead. His feet stopped sweating and Tom loved summer even more.

Chain. Tucker loved to wear chains. He believed that they added to his beauty. One day, he found an amazing chain. It was very expensive but he loved it. Now, Tucker wears his favorite chain every day.
Great lunch. Today I went to lunch. It was rather good. I had the gumbo. I was surprised it was good. I wanted to have it again.

Green Hair. Margaret went to the hair salon to dye her hair. She told them she wanted a blonde color. She sat back and relaxed as they applied the dye. Margaret awoke minutes later when she heard people gasping. The stylist had applied the wrong dye and Margaret's hair was green.

Parting Ways. We had been staying with my aunt and uncle. One night my mom told me that we were moving in with her boyfriend. I cried until my nose bled. My grandparents called to talk to my mom. She moved in with him and I moved in with my grandparents.

Slip and Slide. It was a scorching hot summer day. Ben's mother set up the slip and slide in the yard. All the kids came over to play. They spent hours outside playing. Before they knew it, it was time for dinner.

The Tumor. Mike woke up with a really bad stomach ache one Sunday morning. He immediately went to the hospital as the pain was that bad. When he got there he fainted and did not wake up until several hours. When he awoke the doctor told him that he was lucky, he had a tumor. The operation was successful and Mike was able to live until very old.
Tom Gets A Dog. Tom decides he wants to have a dog. He goes to a dog pound to find a puppy. Tom adopts a young black puppy. He is very excited to bring the puppy home. Tom is glad he got a dog.
The Home. Joan was a realtor. She always lived in an apartment, herself. She grew tired of finding houses for other people. One day, she decided to buy a house! Joan finally had a home of her own.
Kicked Out. My key wouldn't fit. The school had changed my dorm lock. An adviser wanted to meet with me. I had my payment worked out with someone. I had been behind on my payments.

Philly Cheese Steak Sub. Yesterday my wife had a hankering for cheese steak subs. My son had recommended a place about fifteen minutes away. One was their offerings was a Philly style cheese steak sub. I ordered the subs and she picked them up. The subs were very close to those served in Philly.

Havoc. Gary returned home after a long day at work. He found his kids playing in the living room. They were running around yelling. The havoc of the situation annoyed him greatly. He loudly yelled for them to stop.

The Interview. Charles was one of the best rappers alive. He knew he was the best. He made hundreds of dollars selling his demo around town. By the time he was 41, Charles was homeless in a shelter. A radio station journalist asked him how he felt being homeless?

Firework. My friends and I were playing in the street on the fourth of july. One of my friends pulled out a small firecracker and a lighter. We lit the firecracker and threw it away from us. We waited but the firecracker never went off. As soon as we approached it, it blew up in a very violent inferno.

The Perfect Haircut. Tim's girlfriend always made fun of his hair. He thought it was just friendly teasing. But then he started wondering. So he decided to get a different haircut. She wound up liking him more after.
Doug cleans house. Doug is cleaning his house. Doug wants everything perfect. He begins vacuuming the floor. He cleans the whole house. Doug is happy with is clean house.

Corey Deals with his Stress. Corey got a new job which brought more stress than he was used to. Corey wanted to keep working but needed a way to deal with the stress. Corey's friend suggested that he start practicing meditation. He researched meditation techniques and found one that worked. Corey became much less stressed and was happy to keep working.

Car Buying. Cal needed a new car, so he went car shopping. He found a great new car and put a down payment on it. Then he took it to get registered and insured. He was so happy to show it off to his friends. Everyone was amazed at his excellent taste!
Fishing trip. Lily loved fishing. She would go every year. Her dad would take her. The two had so much fun. Lily caught a massive fish.
Pharmacy. Jezebel went to the pharmacy. She bought a pregnancy test. She took a piss in the bathroom. Sure enough, the test came back positive. Jezebel bought a beer and sat in the park sad.

Pickpocket. John took the subway to work each day. One day, he got into a packed car and found a place to hold on. The train was so crowded, there was a lot of jostling. A man bumped into him while exiting. John scowled, realizing the man stole his wallet from his back pocket.

The Move Out. A lady at my job offered me a room to rent, but her husband was crazy. He accosted me more and more over two years. Finally he forced me in a bathroom and screamed I ruined his house. I was 40-years-old and went to bed with a face full of tears. Luckily I landed a high-paying job and moved out in 30 days.

Angela. Angela was scared of the dark. Everyday before bed she would turn her night light on. One day , her night light broke down. She was stuck in total darkness. Angela was terrified of the dark ever since.

Bull Ride. Clay bounced up and down on the bull like a rag doll. He held on and tried to match his movements to the bull. The bull kicked and twisted. Clay jumped off and ran after the bell sounded. He had finished the ride and scored well.

Declined. Tina went out to lunch with her friend Stan. The two of them went to a new restaurant in town. When it came time to pay Tina handed over her card. The card was declined. Tina had no other form of payment so stan had to cover it.

Ride Along. My kids like to ride on trains. We went to San Francisco to ride a few. We visited many famous places by train. We tried to ride every single route. In three days, we accomplished our goal.
Stainless. Blair was embarrassed of her stained rug. She wanted the rug to be spotless. She bought a steam cleaner at the store. She cleaned her rug spotless. Her rug is now stain free.

The Nickname. Kate always had trouble remembering people's names. So she created funny associations to trigger her memory. One fat man named Pete she nicknamed Pig in her head. One day she accidentally called him by the name of Pig! She decided she would never use another mean nickname again.

John's Social Life. Up until this point, John spent most of his adult life single. He has always made an effort to meet new people. However, he was never confident in the people he meets. Until one day, John's friend Eric introduced him to Tanya. Tanya was the best thing that has ever happened to him.

Jailbird. Ray heard a strange knock at the door. A policeman was standing on the other side. After Ray opened the door, he was tackled by the officer. The officer put Ray in handcuffs. Against his will, Ray was taken to the nearby jail.

Swap Shop. Kay and Beth wanted to go to the swap shop. Neither had ever been and wanted to know what it was about. They entered the building and began to look around. There were lots of shops selling jewelry. Kay purchased a dress, and Beth purchased 2 necklaces.
Stuck in traffic. Tom was on his way to work. He had to get there quickly. But he was stuck in traffic. It was taking forever. Finally he had enough.
Chicken and Waffles. Stacy was starving. She hadn't eaten all day. She went to a restaurant that was famous for all-day breakfast. She ordered the chicken and waffles. She ate every last crumb!
Pizza. Tory wanted pizza for dinner. She decided to make it herself. She got all of the ingredients together and set to work. Then, she put the pizza in the oven. The pizza came out great.

The lake storm. Alex was at the lake with his family. Some of the people were out on a boat. Suddenly an intense storm came rolling in. Everyone was worried about the people in the boat. Luckily, they had stopped on a beach and kept themselves safe.

99. My 99 year old neighbor Sam is getting forgetful. Most days he does not remember what he did the day before. Today we had an outdoor luncheon provided by the building manager. Sam came, his hair uncombed and very unshaven. We are trying to call his daughter to voice our concerns.
Caught stealing. Lisa was trying to steal a magazine. She was on her way out of the door. Suddenly, an employee stopped her. She had been caught. Her dad had to come pick her up and pay a fine.

The Phone Call. The mom heard the phone ringing. She answered the phone call quickly. It was the school saying her daughter was sick. She raced to the school and brought the girl home. That was her least favorite kind of phone call!
Interview. Tom had a job interview. He was nervous! But he did his best to impress them. The next day, they called him back. They offered him the job!
Retirement. Frank had been working for 30 years. He finally retired. He was so excited to relax and spend his days however he wanted. He enjoyed all his free time. Retirement was great!

Across the Alley. Omar was riding his bike across an alley. But a van pulled out in front of him. He had no time to stop and hit the van. And he had to buy a new front wheel. Omar always slowed before crossing alleys from then on.

Dishonest. My sister asked for gas money to fill up her gas tank. I gave my credit card for her and told her to take out $40 dollars. However, she ended up taking out $60 dollars. I asked her why she took out the extra $20 dollars. She had nothing to say and remained quiet.

The Shoes. Mary was buying a pair of shoes for her daughter. Her daughter wasn't with her. Mary bought the size of shoes she thought would fit. The shoes didn't fit her daughter. Mary had to return her shoes to the store.
Dehydrated. Tom felt weak. He started to faint. His sister helped him up the stairs. She told him he just was dehydrated. He had been playing football out in the sun.

Building the shed. My tools were becoming too abundant in my backyard. I needed a place to put them to keep them together. I decided to build a small shed. I went to a home improvement store and bought a shed kit. I returned home and set up the shed in my yard.
Handing out candy. It was Halloween night. Tricia was handing out candy. All the sudden lightening struck. Tricia lost her power. She was beyond frightened.

The Pasta Dinner. Mario invited all his friends over. He was making a pasta dinner. He made four different dishes and served them proudly. Everyone ate so much they thought they would burst! They all thanked Mario for the wonderful evening.
Music. He had a lot of work with spanish in it. He wanted to get into the mood. He ate mexican food for breakfast. He also played spanish music. He worked on it all day long.

Tutoring Help. Sam needed to get extra help for his psychology class. His teacher recommended that he go see a tutor. He went to the library and got paired with a tutor. The tutor explained all the concepts to him in a easy way. Sam was able to pass the class with flying colors with the extra help.

Dave needs a new car. Dave was driving to work one day. His car started to make a really loud noise. He pulled over to see what was the problem. His car had blown a gasket. Dave was so frustrated and admitted it was time to buy a new car.

Local Ad. Brandon was chosen to appear in a local TV ad. He was very excited to show up on thousands of televisions. When the television ad aired, his face was shown for a few seconds. It was a lot shorter than he thought, but Brandon didn't care. He got to say that he was on TV.

Too Much Soda. Owen loved to drink soda. One morning Owen discovered he had a bad toothache. He wanted to go to the dentist, but was afraid. His mother convinced him to go see the dentist. The dentist told Owen to stop drinking soda for good.

Dog. Bella wanted a dog. Her mom agreed, as long as Bella cared for it all by herself. Bella promised, so they went to the shelter and picked a dog for her. Bella walked her dog every day, and cleaned and brushed him. Bella's mom was proud of her daughter's responsibility!

Doves cry. Lisa had a nice pond outside her house. She decided to be exotic and adopt a dove. She adopted the dove and put it in her pond the next day. The dove was very sad and lonesome without a playmate. She adopted another dove and her first one fell in love instantly.

The Earthquake. Angie was at home watching a movie. Suddenly, the chair she was sitting in started shaking. Her husband didn't notice anything had happened. Angie wondered what she had felt. Later that night, the news reported a mild earthquake in the area.

The musical student. Brad was a quick learner at the school of music in his city. He was the ideal student to have and many of his teachers agreed. He was a fast learner and could play any instrument they had. He became the next Beethoven and went on to write many composure. He was a genius composer and owed his success to his school of music.

Rita chokes. Rita is out at burger king with her family. She is enjoying her usual meal. While eating she gets something in her throat. Rita is choking and needs help. A burger king employee comes and saves Rita from choking.

Large Ego. Jake was a star basketball player on the local team. During one game, Jake only scored 8 points. He was furious that the other players weren't passing to him. Jake went to the coach to complain about the other players. Jake was kicked off the team.
Beer run. John got hired at a circle k. He was working the night shift. Someone came in to rob him. He gave them all the beer in stock. They got away.
Tom the Drunk. Tom loved to drunk alcohol. He also loved to drink and drive. Tom decided to get more careless one day. Tom drive straight into a tree. Now, drunk Tom is no longer alive.

Tim gets in Shape. Tim was always a little chubby. Eventually he got tired of the way he looked. He asked his friends to help him get in shape. They trained together every day. Tim is now in great shape and is a body builder.

Criticized. Henry decided to carry his famous lasagna to the party. Eventually, Terrence brought his casserole. Jenna was the last person to the party. She came empty handed. Everyone was yelling at her for bringing nothing.

Stale Dale. Dale went to the bakery to get a donut. The man behind the counter bagged him a dozen. Dale thanked the worker for being so speedy. The worker felt so appreciated that he gave Dale more for free. The free donuts were stale, but Dale enjoyed them anyway.

Bathrobe. Agnes loved her old blue tartan bathrobe, which she'd had for years. But the old robe was full of holes, and Agnes needed a new one. While in the store, Agnes was sure she'd never find one she liked. But she came across a wonderfully soft and fluffy yellow robe. Agnes happily wore her new robe, and let the old one retire.

Teaching Lesson. Mary was driving on the highway in her car. She saw a man standing next to his car on the side of the road. She pulled over and he told her he has a flat tire. He told Mary that he doesn't know how to change a tire himself. Mary changed the tire and fought him how for next time.

seeing eye dog. Josh saw his new neighbor walking a dog. Josh ran up to pet the dog. But the new neighbor stopped him! He told Josh that it was a seeing-eye dog. Josh was sad that he couldn't pet the dog.
Fire. Henry lit a fire. He kept adding dried kindling. The fire roared bigger. Henry got into his cot of pine needles. The warmth from the fire caused him to sleep soundly.

Veteran's Day. Bill wanted to do something special for Veteran's Day. He went to the homeless shelter. There were many homeless veterans there. He helped feed 200 of them. Bill felt very good at the end of the day!

Hitting the curb. My friend and I went to the big city to run some errands. He always gives me trouble about my driving skills and I get nervous. So I was running my mouth on the way home and hit a curb. It cost over $1000 to fix! My friend will never let me live it down.

Travel to Hawaii. I went to Hawaii with my family when I was younger. First we flew from Atlanta to LAX, then from LAX to Honolulu. It was wonderful seeing the beaches and great scenery. We ate at some expensive fast food place. Then we rode in the water on jetskis.

Married. Andrew was nervous and happy. He was getting married. He was was sweating because he was afraid he would be a bad husband. He saw her walk down the aisle and the nerves were gone. He said I do and kissed her.

Turtle Violation. Jo liked turtles. She went to Hawaii to see big turtles. At a beautiful beach, she saw many turtles on the lava. She stroked the head of one the turtles. The police told her to stop.

My Best friend Andy and Larry. My cat name is Andy. My dog name is Larry. Andy and Larry came from the animal shelter on the same day. Andy and Larry didn't like each other when they first met. Andy and Larry play with each other everyday, they are my best friends.

Bad purchase. I went on ebay to purchase a pair of shoes. When the package finally arrive I was happy. Then, I notice something was off when I open the package. The shoes was very small. The person who sold it to me lied about the shoe's size.

Sisters Fighting. Julia was looking for her very favorite blouse. When she didn't find it she went to ask her sister. To her surprise her sister was wearing the shirt. She refused to take it off and Julia attacked her. Their dad broke it up and took the shirt away for good.

Stomach. He woke up early because his stomach was hurting. He said it felt like a burning pain. He smoked a cigarette, which didn't help. He tried eating some breakfast. Eventually the pain went away.

Spot the Dog. Spot is a beagle and she loves to run. Spot's owners recently moved from the country to the city. Spot now has a yard instead of open fields to play in. She kept getting out of the yard because she wanted more room. When her owners installed an electric fence, Spot was finally content.

Nasty Attitude. Charles went to the car show and wanted to meet a girl. He walked through the parking lot and looked at girls. He saw three models standing by a car. He asked one girl if he could have a word with her in private. A girl, who he wasn't talking too, got upset and told him to leave.

Lake. Kate was talking to her friend Sue. Sue's grandma had a cabin on a lake. Sue regaled her with all the stories of being at the lake. Kate felt incredibly left out and really wished she was there. That night Kate dreamt of being on a lake.

Bagpipe. Timothy loved to play on his bagpipes. He played them so much that he became very good at them. He played for his friends and family every day. One day, he received a phone call from the president. Then, Timothy was able to play his bagpipes for the president.

NYC. Sarah went to New York City for the first time. She met her friend at the bus station. They walked through Bryant Park. Next, they got on a subway train to Queens. In the end, they decided to shop at the Queens mall.

Italian Food. Mark went on a trip to Italy. He ate a lot of pasta and pizza. He learned some recipes. Back at home, he cooked a lot of pasta and pizza. Finally, he got sick of Italian food and never eat it again.

Skydiver. Anna wanted to skydive. She got her friend to sign up with her. The two girls eagerly showed up at the location. Their instructor suited them up and prepared them. They they jumped together, screaming with joy!

Trapped Dog. One day out of the blue there was a dog in the yard next to Gina's. The little white dog tapped and tapped as she walked to her porch. She heard a lady's voice call to the dog. The little dog went running back into the house. Gina felt bad that the dog rarely was able to go outside.

Broken Television. Tom was watching television one day. He heard a loud pop and saw smoke coming out of it. The repairs to fix it were really expensive. Tom realized it would be cheaper to just buy a new television. He got a bigger screen and more recent technology.

Hamsters for All. Joe had two hamsters that eventually had babies. He didn't know what to do with them all. The senior prank was coming up at school so he got an idea. Joe took all twenty babies and let them loose in the school. The school had to close for the day.
Not what expected. Suzy bought some calls in a stock. She thought it would go higher. But contrary to her belief the stock tanked. Suzy was horrified. She lost all her money.

Friend. Robert was trying to help his friend with his car troubles. They diagnosed the issue and looked online for a fix! Unfortunately they couldn't find anything. Robert asked his neighbor for some help and he accepted. His neighbor was able to fix the car and solve his friend's issue.

Shane goes to a play. Shane was walking down the street. He noticed an ad for a play starting that night. He decided to go see it and have fun. Shane went to the location of the play and went inside. Shane watched the play and enjoyed it very much.

Chalky. Hank's mouth felt sort of weird. He'd just gotten a composite resin filling the day before. Now there was a chalky taste and the feeling of something artificial. Hank read that alcohol could wear away the rosin material. He decided to binge on coffee to wash away the taste.

Jorge Cooks Beans. Jorge has always wanted to learn his father's famous recipe for beans. Finally the day has arrived for Jorge to learn. He spends the entire day with his father learning each step. Once he has learned, he practices making beans at his own home. Jorge is proud he has finally learned his father's recipe for beans.

Jack buys car accessories. Jack thought his car looked too boring. He decided that it needed more accessories. Jack went to a car accessories store. He bought new rims and a spoiler. Now jack is more satisfied with how his car works.

Not Mad. Jane had broken her first pair of glasses. And now she had to tell her mother. She was sure to be upset. After telling her mom Jane braced herself for the yelling. Instead her mom just smiled and gave her a hug.
Pool. Tom loved playing pool. He had his own table at his home. Tom became obsessed with pool. Tom practiced twelve hours per day. Tom eventually became a professional pool player.

Cheap Move. Jim challenged me to a video game match of street fighter. We hooked the controllers to the console and started playing. At first, he was winning the match. Yet, I managed to take the lead. In order to win, he pulled out my controller plug.

Safe and Sound. Earl saw a large safe at a garage sale. The owner gave it to him for free because he couldn't open it. Earn began took it home and tried to open it. He banged on the safe with a hammer for hours. He was very tired at the end of this but the safe was still closed.

News. Tom was an amateur news videographer. He filmed many news events. The news station rejected his film because of his low quality camera. Tom bought a high quality video camera. The news station happily paid for his high quality film.

Broken Arm. I was racing my brother through the park on our bicycles. I lost control while trying to shift and crashed my bike. My arm was broken in three spots and I wore a cast for 2 months. I couldn't run track that season, which really upset me. I never rode a bike again after that.

Mary's Kitten. Mary was playing outside when she found a kitten. The kitten was scared and wouldn't let Mary near him. Mary brought the kitten some food and water. The kitten cautiously approached the food and water. The kitten felt safe and let Mary pet him.

The Mattress. Chris was having trouble sleeping. He tossed and turned on his old, lumpy mattress. Chris decided he needed to replace the mattress. He went to the store and picked one out. He was going to sleep so well after it was delivered!

Tooth. Greg was at work and was eating lunch in the breakroom. He brought a bag of carrots to eat. He bit down on the first carrot and felt something crack. He spit out a piece of his tooth. He made an appointment to see the dentist that afternoon.
Migraine. I had to go home from work. I got sick with a migraine. Nothing would make it stop. I ended up taking a pain pill. I slept for 10 hours straight.

RMV. I had a stroke in the fall of 2011. I got back on my feet in 2012. I took adaptive driving lessons to learn how to drive one handed. In 2012, at 60, I took the road test again. I passed, and was very happy.

Basketball Rim. Elizabeth was playing basketball with some friends. She jumped up to dunk the ball. She ended up breaking the rim. As it came crashing down, she jumped out of the way. Elizabeth looked at her hands, in awe of her strength.

To much of a good thing. Catherine rented a new house with a large yard and many fruit trees. At first the family was very excited as they always had fresh fruit. There was to much fruit for the family to eat. Catherine started selling the fruit so they wouldn't rot. Now part of her rent is paid by selling the fruit.

Rotten Luck. Stanley was a little boy during the Great Depression. He was always hungry. One day he was playing behind a store. He found a box of chocolate bars next to the trash. When he bit into one there were maggots inside.

Lilly has a stroke. Lilly is playing with her grandkids. She is trying her best to keep up with them. Lilly starts feeling terrible. She falls to the ground. Lilly is rushed to a hospital she had a stroke.

The Gym. Kay wanted to lose some weight. She decided to join a gym. She went to the gym 4 days a week for 2 months. After 2 months she weighed 20 pounds less. Amy was encouraged by her hard work and kept working out.

Reading. I try to read 100 pages from a book every day. Yesterday I was behind. My wife had taken me to breakfast, and I had read only 20 pages. I sat down in the afternoon and read 80pages. I was exhausted after that.

An unexpected accident. My father was in a car accident this morning. It wasn't a serious accident, but he was scared. Two courteous police officers asked him questions about the event. He called his insurance to cover for the damages. Everything turned alright in the end.

Selfish People. Stan decided to purchase a pizza for the family, As soon as he placed the food on the table, the family came. They shoved me in the back of the room. Although I felt unappreciated, I held my own ground. I walked back to the table.
Ruined Mailbox. Someone had hit Bob's mailbox with a hammer. Bob was very upset. The mailbox was ruined. Bob bought a new mailbox. He surrounded it with brick.

Bleach Cap Search. Kim lost the bleach cap. Her mother was furious, but didn't know it was Kim who lost it. Kim searched the bathroom, laundry room, and her bedroom. She couldn't find it anywhere. Finally after an hour she found it in the bathroom garbage can.

grocery. Mary needed to buy baby food for her baby. She realized the grocery did not have any baby food. She goes to another grocery in hopes of finding baby food. She finally finds baby food in an aisle. Mary felt relieved and goes home to feed her baby.
Padding. The padding was starting to come out of the seams. She tried to push it back in. It popped back out,to no avail. She sighed and got the sewing supplies. She stitched up the tear in the toy.
mike walker. Sarah wanted to walk a mile in 15 minutes. She could only walk a mile in 25 minutes. She walked a mile every day. Each time get better. She can now walk a mile in 15 minutes.

Movie rip off. I used to love going to the movies. Now I will never go back because it's expensive. They overcharge for everything. Food and the tickets are overpriced. I am much happier with my Netflix subscription instead.
Tyler saves the baby. Tyler is walking home. Tyler sees a baby hanging out of the window. The baby falls. Tyler runs and dives to catch the baby. Tyler catches the baby and saves his life.

My Mom Lost Her Job Today. My mom was laid off from her job today. It was not my mom's fault. The woman my mom replaced at work was on maternity leave. The woman will be back at her desk tomorrow. My mom needs to start looking for a new job.

Wedding Party. Jane and Rob had a very lovely wedding ceremony. But after their vows, they just wanted to unwind. They decided to just mingle with guests and dance! Eventually, they loosened up and enjoyed themselves. At the end of the night, they reflected on their magical evening.

Lost Deal. Tim found a good deal at the store. Unfortunately he didn't have enough money on him. He tried to hide the item while he went home. He got more money and returned. The item had been taken by then.
Lansing Trip. One day Shannon went to Lansing. First she went to Potter Park Zoo. Then she went to Impression 5 Science Center. Finally she went to the Capitol Building. She had a fun day.

Easter Bunny. Dan recently saw a job advertisement in the mall. Dan decided to inquire about the details of the position. Dan learned that the position was to dress up as the Easter bunny. After laughing a bit, Dan decided to accept the job. Dan was anxious how his job as the Easter bunny would go.

Bad Dessert. Fran worked at a restaurant. She lost an earring while making dessert. She could not find it anywhere. A customer found Fran's earring in her dessert. Fran apologized, but she got fired anyway.

Mike Fixes His Overheating PC. Mike was playing computer games. All of a sudden, his computer started to freeze. His computer was overheating. Mike bought a new CPU cooler from the electronics store. He installed the cooler and fixed his freezing problems.

Loud music. Jim hated rock music. His girlfriend only listened to rock music. His girlfriend always liked playing music at a loud volume. Jim decided to get his girlfriend some headphones. Both Jim and his girlfriend were happy with the outcome.

Tax Evasion. Jimmy was in a rock and a hard place. He had recently divorced his wife, and gotten laid off from his job. To make matters worse, the IRS was after him for thousands in taxes. Fortunately for him - Jimmy had a slightly unethical accountant. He was able to hide some of his money in an offshore account.

New York Vacation. One day the Zicker family went on vacation to New York. First they went to the Empire State Building. Then they walked around downtown. Then they went to Central Park. Finally they went to the Bronx Zoo.

College Applications. Ginger lived in Honolulu. She wanted to go to the Mainland for college. Her parents wanted her to stay on the island. Ginger was accepted to UCLA. She decided to go to college in California.

Generations. I wanted my relatives to our know our family history. I collected old pictures from family reunions. I photocopied old obituaries that contained our family history. I interviewed older relatives to fill in the blanks. Now my family can see our history on the Facebook account I created.

Vegas. Scott had the chance to go to Vegas for work. He decided to do a little gambling while he was there. He started off making money at first. Over the evening, he slowly lost the money he used to gamble. Thankfully, he knew when to stop so he didn't lose too much.

No Hesitation. The students received an email about a sale in the bookstore. As soon as the bell rung, everyone decided to run to the store. I wanted to shop for supplies however, it was hard to get inside. I decided to leave the store. During the next day, the sale was no longer present.

Car in Parking Garage. David drove into a parking garage in an unfamiliar city. The garage was empty because it was closed. He couldn't drive out because the gate was locked. David walked out and found someone driving. The stranger drove to the gate so it would open, which let David exit.
the song. Jack listened to music on his iPhone while laying on his bed. He heard a very sad song. Jack began to cry. Jack love this song. Jack continued to listen to music.

The move. Charles had packed everything and was saying his goodbyes. As he drove to the station he wondered if he'd see his friends again. He took the train and got settled in his new home. Three days later he received a phone call from his friend Steve. Steve was coming to visit so he would see them again!

Coupon Clipping. Anne says she has been spending too much on groceries. I suggested she should only buy things on sale and use coupons. I brought over a lot of newspapers and magazines. We spent all afternoon clipping coupons. Anne wants me to help her clip coupons every week for now on.

Online Shopping. Mark wanted to buy a new laptop. He went to the electronics store to check some out. He tested different ones and found the one he liked. Then he went home and found the best deal online. He got it within a couple of days and was really happy.
New Router. We moved to Cambridge in 2013. I needed a new router. My brother installed it. It took hours and a call to tech support. I will hire someone next time I need a router.

Firebug. Rhoda was a girl who played with matches. The adults who cared for her mistakenly left matches within her reach. Rhoda waited till she was alone and struck them. Her clothes caught on fire. She received severe burns over most of her body.
New handbag. Tina wanted a new handbag. Her old one was ripping. So she decided to splurge. She walked into Louis Vuitton. She loved everything but ultimately decided on a classic bag.

Space Mountain. Max was at Disneyland. After a three hour wait he was finally going to ride space mountain. He put on his lap belt and threw his hands in the air. Within seconds of starting, all lights came on and it stopped. They were forced to evacuate and the ride shut down for the day.

Movies. Amy and Kim were at Lynn's house. Lynn showed them the new Hunger Games movie she had purchased. They decided to have a movie marathon. They would watch all The Hunger Games movies back to back. They decided to have a sleep over.

amnesia. John woke up on the beach not remembering who he was. John looked at his belongings. John found a car key. John used the car key to find out the car. John remembered who he was from his things in the car.

Getting Ears Pierced. Nancy was scared to get her ears pierced for the first time. Her mother took her to Claire's and sat her down on the chair. Nancy trembled with fear as she watched the woman get the needle. The needle gun pushed into her ear and put in pretty earrings. To her dismay, Nancy was not in pain and she loved the earrings.
Total heat stroke. Last year I went to the local fair. It was a hundred degrees. I felt like I was going to pass out. I ran to the nearest trashcan. I couldn't help getting sick.

To the Beach. Cam went to the beach to relax. He put out his blanket and set up his chair. In the distance a boat sailed across the sea. Cam waved at the boat and tried to see if they waved back. He squinted hard but didn't see anything.
The Hair Band. The girl's hair was a mess. She needed a hair band. She tied her hair up. When she ran around at her soccer game, it all came out. Next time, she would use a headband, too.
Army Recruit. Cody signed up to join the army. He had to go through a physical. Cody had a bad knee. Cody wasn't able to pass the physical. He wasn't able to be in the army.

Graphing Calculator. Sam needed to get a graphing calculator for his Calculus class. He saved up all summer in order to buy it. After the end of summer, he saved up $100. He bought a brand new TI-84 graphic calculator with the money. Sam installed games on his calculator immediately afterwards.

Tail. My coworker Geno had a girlfriend who worked in the area. He did not want to tell us about her and get teased. One day I followed him as he went to lunch. I was ten feet behind him as he met his girlfriend for lunch. We kidded him about her when he came back.

Road Trip. Eve and her family decided to take a little road trip. They did not go far, just a little out of their state. Being away from the stress of their lives helped them bond. They grew closer as a family as a result. Eve and her family decided to start taking regular road trips.

The Paper. Jamie had been writing all day. She was writing an important paper for history class. She turned it in and felt anxious. She couldn't wait to see her grade. She knew she had done a bad job on it.

The old town visit. Missy was visiting the town she grew up in. She was really nostalgic visiting the old places. Then, she decided to go see her old house. She was going up the street and realized her house was gone. She was so sad to learn that it had been destroyed.

In Trouble. Our friends got together in recess. Since Drew was bored, he decided to grab Diana. He was trying to spin her around horizontally. The teacher found out and walked to them. He gave Drew detention for two days.
The Goat. Tommy wanted a goat. He asked his dad. His dad said no. Tommy found a Goat on his way home from school. He took it to Grandpa's farm.

Ferns. Tanya parted the ferns, and looked between them. The villagers were unaware of her presence. Tanya watched as they performed their primitive mating rituals. She discreetly took pictures with a zoom lens. She sold the pictures to a magazine when she returned home.

Siblings. Amy met Jane at a family reunion. They were close in age, but weren't sure how they were related. The girls bonded over things they both liked. Amy and Jane eventually talked about a cousin named John. They realized they were sisters!

Rex Can't Sleep. Rex has been in bed for two hours but hasn't fallen asleep. At last, he decides to get up and watch television. The repetitive chatter of the television gradually lulls Rex to sleep. When he wakes up he feels well rested. Rex is happy that he finally fell asleep.

Camping. George and Kate went on a camping trip. They got lost somewhere deep in the woods. George was too scared to do anything. Kate used her compass and wits to help them get out of the woods. George thanked Kate for saving their lives.

The Game. It was the day of Bill's Championship game. He was so nervous as he wanted to win. He had practiced for weeks leading up to the game. Finally it was game time and bill was ready. Bill's team won the game!
The Pistol. Megan heard a loud bang. She ran outside to investigate it. An old man was shooting cans with a pistol! She screamed at him to stop. He looked at her and laughed.

Leaf Collector. Molly's teacher gave the class a leaf collection assignment. Molly forgot about the assignment until the day before it was due. She looked forlornly around her tree-bare neighborhood. Then, Molly got an idea. She went to a nursery and secretly plucked leaves from every tree.

Frank Finds a Friend. Frank was a retiree who was living alone in a small neighborhood. All the other families in the neighborhood had young children. Because of this demographic, he had no friends nearby. One day, a new elderly couple moved in next door to him. Frank was thrilled and made friends with his new neighbors.

Driving School. Kathy was learning how to drive. But she constantly worried she would get into an accident. So she decided to she would only use public transportation. But while waiting for the bus alone, she constantly felt afraid. And she regret quitting her driving lessons.

Summer 1987. My family took a trip to the coast. We got to see the Long Beach kite festival. I loved the fireworks on the beach. We got to visit family we had not seen in years. It was a great summer vacation.

The Expensive Bill. Carly was looking at her mail when she saw an electric bill. She opened it to check on her amount. She was shocked to see a total twice as high as usual. She called the bill company expecting some sort of mistake. To her dismay she learned she had used too much power.

Sanitary. A pool of blood was in the center of the floor. Mike fumed to his boss about it. He insisted it was a clear safety violation. His boss told him that it was only if an inspector saw it. Mike grumbled and went back to slaughtering the cow.

Wednesday Dinner. My family needed to eat so I prepared dinner. I located the pizzeria's phone number online. I called and placed my order. I drove to the shop and picked up our food. I set the table and we all ate good.

The Letter. Julie kept his letter on her nightstand beside her bed. She read it first thing every morning. She would wake up early, read it -- then read it again. She would then lay back down and think about everything he wrote. She missed him but she knew he'd be back someday.

Fast Cars. I had a slow car. But, I wanted to take part in the local racing club. So, I decided to upgrade my car. After thousands of dollars in expenses, my car became quite fast! My car was able to beat many other racers at the local club.
Wedding Disaster. Tom was getting married. He got cold feet at the last minute. He ran out of the chapel. His fiance didn't know what to do. She never saw him again.

The Rug. The woman hated her tile floors. She bought a giant rug to cover them up. They were colorful and pretty. But as soon as the dog stepped on them, they were covered in dog hair. She regretted her decision.

Hair Spray. Stacy had frizzy hair. She bought some hair spray to try and tame it. The spray weighed her hair down too much. It made her hair flat and stiff. Stacy decided she needed to try mousse instead.

Jake Finds a Friend. Jake was taking out the garbage. He heard a rustling noise in the bush nearby. He saw a famished puppy looking for food. Jake took the puppy inside his home and fed it. Jake kept the puppy and raised it as his pet.

Writing a Song. Jason was working hard. He was trying to craft a perfect song. He wrote down the lyrics. Jason practiced his song on his guitar many times. He was finally happy with it and thought that it might even be a hit.

Sandwich Thief. Rob bullied Jim every day at school. Sometimes, Rob would steal Jim's lunch money. Jim decided to bring his lunch so that Rob wouldn't steal it. Jim brought a peanut butter sandwich, but Rob stole the sandwich. Rob took a bite and died because he was allergic to peanuts.

A bear spotted. Avery was taking out her garbage. She was just closing the lid to the bin when she saw something. A medium sized black bear was down the street. The bear was rummaging through someone else's trash. She quickly went inside to call animal control.

Fun at the Park. Camden and his brother loved going to the park. His mother took them there often. Camden decided to play on the seesaw. He and his brother got going very fast. Camden fell off and split his head open.

David goes fishing. David loved to be in nature. He was stuck at his office job 5 days a week. David decided he needed to get outdoors. He decided to take a little weekend fishing trip. David ended up having the best time fishing.

The New Drone. Chuck had made millions in his software company. He has a Christmas light display at his 22 acre home. It was featured on national TV but did not win the contest. He bought a drone and equipped it with a camera. The video from the drone of his 70 foot tall Christmas tree was great.

Answered Prayer. Doris thought she could really sing, but everyone knew different. Her singing was almost painful to the ears, but no one ever told her. She stood up to sing in church, and the congregation almost groaned. The pastor began to pray very loudly and everyone bowed their heads He prayed until dismissal, and everyone was truly thankful.

One Store School Supplies. Ellie was about to begin high school. Ellie needed to buy many things for the new school year. She made a list of supplies. Her mom took her to the office supply store. She got everything she needed in one store.

Clean Towels. Last week I was taking a shower. When I got out I started to dry myself. I quickly noticed the towel was dirty. Somehow it made its way to the clean laundry. I had to dry out without a towel.

piercing. Sarah wanted a new piercing on her belly button. So she found a store she liked. She went to the store and bought to get her belly button pierced. She got her belly button pierced and it hurt. She was glad to have her piercing.

No experience. Tim was looking for a job. However, no one would hire someone with no experience. Tim decided to get an internship working for free. He worked very hard. At the end of the internship he gained tons of experience.
The costume party. I went to a costume party. I glued leaves to my head. I also wore a green cape. Everyone laughed at my costume. However, I won first prize in the costume contest.
The Test. Jerry was a very bad student. He never studied for any exams. One day, he studied very hard for his science test. He got an A. His teacher praised him.

Daughter to Work. Our daughter took her two-year old to her work today. The toddler behaved for an hour. Then she started playing with paper clips. Soon there were clips all over the floor. Luckily the director was off today.

Greedy Child. Earnest was a greedy child. He ate his food very fast without chewing properly. One day while he ate a fresh peach he choked on the pit. His family unsuccessfully tried the Heimlich maneuver on him. He died as a result of his greediness.
