Snacks. There were snacks in the pantry. I picked my favorite ones. I opened the back of crackers I chose. I ate one of the crackers. I gave one to my brother.
Card games. My dad brought home a pack of cards. He shuffled them very quickly. He passed the cards to me and my brothers. We looked at all the cards in our hands. I folded because my hand was bad.

Oscar's Onions. Oscar loved to grow onions. His pickled his onions and decided to try and sell them. He opened up a stall out in front of his house with the jars. However, nobody seemed to want to buy his onions. Oscar was forced to keep hundreds of jars of pickled onions!

Kick in the Shin. The official announced that there's two minutes left on the game. Both teams were trying to make a goal. Jenny from the blue team had possession of the soccer ball. Anna tried to kick the ball away from her. She ended up kicking Jenny in the face.
Burnt Pizza. Jake tried to bake a frozen pizza. He put it in the oven and started watching tv. Jake forgot to set an alarm. After a while he smelled smoke. He had burned the pizza he forgot about.

Comedy Show. Ben and Kerri went to a comedy show. The show featured one of Ben's favorite comedians. Ben and Kerri laughed throughout the entire show. After the show, Ben was able to get the comedian's autograph. Ben and Kerri had an evening out to remember.

Beer for Breakfast. Charles stayed up all night on an assignment. Before he knew it the sun came up. He decided to go to the grocery store to get food. While there he decided to get beer also. He drank the morning after a hard workday.
Getting fit. Tim was trying to get fit. He decided to run everyday. It was very hard. He wanted to quit. He decided to keep at it until he was fit.

Erin and the water bottle. Erin was running one day and felt thirsty. Erin ran to a nearby liquor store to get water. The water was expensive, but he bought it anyway. Erin was excited and ran outside with his water to drink it. He dropped the water bottle and lost his water and money.

Malaysia. Neil had been visiting Indonesia, and loving it. He decided to prolong his joy by visiting a neighboring country. So he flew into the nearby country of Malaysia. The beaches and forests there were even more beautiful! Neil couldn't believe how gorgeous the country of Malaysia was!

Thunder. Thunder could be heard outside of Joe's house. Joe could also hear his dog whimpering. Joe grabbed his dog and took it to Joe's bed. Joe cuddled with the dog to comfort it. The dog stopped whimpering.

The cool rental. Abigail had set up a rental for a vacation with her husband. She wasn't sure what to expect from the place. When they arrived she was very pleased. It was a cozy, private cabin with nice furnishings. She enjoyed her stay a lot.

The Stuck Stroller. Maya had just arrived at the doctor's office for an appointment. She was pushing her child in his stroller. Suddenly, she was stuck at the base of some stairs. She tried to lift the stroller past the steps but almost couldn't. Luckily she finally got the wheels up and headed inside.

Break Up. JD has recently experienced a bad breakup. His girlfriend of 6 Year's broke up with him unexpectedly At first JD was devastated. However, he soon realized he barely missed his ex-girlfriend. It was then that he realized she made the right decision.

Cabin. Lila's favorite vacation spot was a cabin in the mountains. Every summer, her family would stay there to kayak and hunt. One summer, a bear broke into their cabin. It tore the house to pieces. Lila's family had to postpone the trip for a few weeks to fix it.
Wedding. Kim got married. She had the wedding outside. She had all of her friends inside afterward. It was a very special day. Her life had changed forever.

Rick's Day at the Waterpark. Rick finally went to visit the local waterpark. He couldn't believe how many rides there were. Rick decided to go on every single one. Afterwards, it was so late that it was time to go home. Rick decided he wanted to visit the waterpark again soon.

Vacation Time. Ray bought airline tickets to Bora Bora. He drove to the airport early the next morning. Ray boarded the plane when his seat number was called. Ray got his luggage from the carousel after the flight. Ray went to the beach as soon as he arrived in Bora Bora.

Earrings. Lisa noticed her daughter wasn't wearing her earrings. She asked her daughter where the earrings were. Lisa's young daughter told her she ate the earring. Lisa brought her daughter to the ER. X-rays confirmed the earring's location and they eventually passed.
Pills. I went to see the doctor. He looked at my legs. He told me to decrease sodium in my diet. He gave me a prescription for pills. I have to take them every day to get rid of the swelling.

Clarence's Project. Clarence decided to take on a project for the summer. He decided that he would restore an old car. Clarence and his father picked up an old Corvette. All summer long, Clarence toiled over the car. At the end of the summer, he had a nice new car.
Twin Feud. Lou was a sweet girl. She had a twin sister. Her sister wasn't very nice. Lou was always being bullied by her twin. The girl's mother had to always intervene to keep the peace.

We're Gonna Need A Bigger... Bob got a job on a fishing boat in Alaska. He wanted to earn money to buy a house. Bob hated the dangerous work but it paid well. One day a ferocious shark bit off both of his legs. Bob spent the money he saved up to buy a house on prosthetic legs.

Upgrade to first class. My last flight I paid standard economy for my seat. However my flight ended up being delayed ten hours. Thankfully for the next flight they upgraded me to first class. The upgrade was free. I was very thrilled.

Learning to swim. Sally was eight and couldn't swim. Her older brother Eli decided to teach her. He helped her get comfortable in the pool. Then, he helped her to practice swimming around. After a few hours, she finally got the hang of it.

Hyacinth. Anna got a potted hyacinth for her birthday. It had just started blooming. She planted it outside and the flowers blossomed. Over the winter the bulb froze in the ground. Then next spring, the flowers returned!

No Swim in the Park. Larry had never been to a water park before. He decided to change this. He saved up enough money for entrance. Then, he packed his bags and suit and went to the park. Larry had the most enjoyable day swimming he had ever had before.

Pickpocket. I was riding on the bus today. A person bumped into me. The person who bumped into me started to hurry off the bus with my pur I screamed to the bus driver to not let him off. The bus driver kept the door closed till the police came.

New Pajamas. Ellen took her kids to Target for grocery shopping. They were really well behaved the whole trip. She saw some pajamas near the front of the store on sale. She let each child pick out a new pair of pajamas as a reward. They loved the pajamas and wore them all day long!

Magnet. Kyle found a magnet lying under his bed. He began playing with it all around the house. His mother ordered him not to play around the TV with it. He ignored her, dragging the magnet across the TV. He felt ashamed when the magnet distorted the TV's picture.

Long-Winded. Gina is an avid reader. She last read Moby Dick. However, Gina really hates some of the books that she's read. Moby Dick is one of them. She said it took way too long to get to the point of the story.
Bar Fight. Tom was at the bar. There were a few drunk people there. Tom noticed a fight start to break out. He decided to leave. By the time he was outside he noticed cops pulling up.

Buying a suit. I was going to a friend's wedding. I didn't have a suit but needed one. I went to a local tailor. They measured me and made me a suit. It was surprisingly cheap,and the suit looked good.

The Dam. My husband and son made a dam in the river. It was so much fun because there was an opening in it. We were able to float our tubes down the rapids faster with the dam. We played all day there. I think we will go back again tomorrow.

Clashing Color. Tom was going to be interviewed on the news. He decided to dress up. Unfortunately he picked a bad color. It matched and clashed with the backdrop. Tom asked if he could change but there wasn't time.

Charity. Christina converted to Islam when she was in college. Before she converted, she read a lot about Islam. She found out that Muslims should not have names like hers. Christina means follower of Christ which is not in line with Islam. Christina changed her name to Charity.
Tooth Fairy. Lucy went to the dentist. She had a tooth extracted. She asked to keep the tooth. She put it under her pillow. The tooth fairy never came though.

Christmas. It was Christmas with the family again. Mark brought the ham, and Jim brought the salad. All the food was set on the table ready to be eaten. The kids ate as fast as they could to get to  the presents. After dinner, the family started the presents, everyone was happy.

The Acorn. A squirrel scampered across the yard. He snatched up an acorn and ran away. The dog chased him until he got to the fence. That squirrel bothered him every day! He sat on the deck and waited for the creature to come back in.
Old book. Susie needed a new book. Unfortunately it was too expensive. Thankfully she found a cheap one. It was old though. But it did the trick.

Kenny loses the girl. Kenny was a handsome young man. He was a little too cocky. One day he thought he could pull one over his girl. He tried to kiss another girl while out with his girl. Kenny lost his main girl over being a jerk.

When A Family Visit Isn't. Miley loves everything that Disney does. She especially loves going to Disney world. The first time she took her kids she lied to them. She told them they were going to Grandma's. Her kids were happy and surprised to go to Disney World instead.

Open relationship. Steve asked his girlfriend if she would have an open relationship. She told Steve he can do whatever he wants. Steve took that as they have an open relationship now. A week later, he sees online that she has a new boyfriend. Steve is shocked and annoyed.

Foggy. Marion was driving on the highway in the early morning. The road was caked in a thick layer of fog. Even with headlights, Marion could barely see. She drove extra carefully for the entire commute. Marion was relieved when she reached her destination.
Free Drinks. Jill was at the bar. Guys kept hitting on her. They kept offering her drinks. Jill accepted them all. She gave them away to her friends.

A Man and His Dog. A man named Lars had a disobedient dog. The dog was so disobedient that he would dig holes and eat his shoes. Lars wanted help so he took the dog out to a trainer. After weeks of training, the dog became docile. Lars felt good to see this change and began to play more with his dog.

Disney World. It was Lindsey's first trip to Disney World. She had wanted to go since she was a child! She rode every ride and saw every character. She took five hundred photos! She returned home and began planning her next trip!

Choices. My wife and I had decided to visit the Florida Keys in January. Christmas took us totally by surprise. We could give gifts or take vacation. We finally decided to give gifts. There is always next year.

Bob's Business. Bob was unhappy at his job for a long time. One day, Bob quit his job and went home. The next day, he went to the bank and got a business loan. Bob set up a burger restaurant, and started getting lots of customers. Now bob is very happy!

The Tiger and the Goat. Zookeepers throw a goat into a tiger's enclosure. The goat is meant to be a meal for the tiger. But the stubborn goat is not afraid of the tiger. The goat refuses to back down. Instead of being the tiger's meal they become best friends.

Planking. Josh wanted to work on his abs. But doing situps and crunches hurt his neck and back. So he read about planking and tried it. After a few weeks, he was able to hold a plank for half an hour. And his abs continued to get flatter and more muscular.

New Place. Betty was moving to a new apartment today. She had everything packed and was waiting on a friend. The friend showed up with a big truck. They both loaded everything into the truck and moved downtown. Betty was happy as she slept in her new apartment.
Peas. Franklin was eating dinner. He was pushing his peas around his plate. His mother told him not to play with his food. Franklin piled some peas onto his spoon. He then flicked it at his sister.

The Yellow Gauntlets. Angeline was trying to cosplay as her favorite character. She had all of the pieces except for some gauntlets. She was panicking because her costume didn't look right without them. Luckily, her friend was also a cosplayer, and had some similar pieces. She let her borrow some yellow gauntlets which matched her idea.

Doggy Love. Chad was going to the shelter today to adopt a dog. Chad was excited that he would be a proud dog owner. As Chad entered the shelter, a hefty black lab approached him. It was almost an instant connection for Chad and the dog. Chad was excited to have his new dog join him at home.

Lobster. I decided to order lobster at a fancy restaurant. However, it was too hard to eat. I needed to smash it open with a mallet. Then I had to dig for the good lobster meat. So I had it switched out for a cheese burger.

Competition. Jim walked into a bank and noticed a man in a hood. The man drew a weapon and demanded money from the clerk. Jim walked behind him and quickly disarmed the man. The bank clerk was very thankful. Jim then drew his own weapon, and demanded money.

The bike tip. George was walking past a row of parked bikes. Suddenly, he bumped one of the back tires. This caused all of the bikes to go falling over. He looked around and saw that no one had seen. Quickly, he fled from the seen.
Dinner plans. John wanted to take Sue to dinner. He finally got the nerve to ask her out. He called and asked her to dinner. They decided on a restaurant. They had an enjoyable evening.

Unending Sadness. Reggie had a very hard time in the military. He had been put on many different medications but nothing worked. He couldn't stand it anymore and decided to do something about it. He took over the lethal limit of a drug called Zyprexa. He didn't remember anything for three days and woke up in the hospital.

Errand. When I was seven Years old my dad went on an errand. He claimed he was just going to the store for some groceries. I fell asleep before he got back. The next morning I realized he still wasn't back. My mom and I never really talked about it after that.
Rita passes. Rita is 16. Rita wants her driver's licenses. Rita studies. Rita takes the exam. Rita passes.

Brad gets revenge. Brad was bullied during school for his new glasses. The bullies took his glasses off him and broke them. Brad went home to cry and thought about getting revenge. The next day Brad decided to embarrass his bully in revenge. Brad had shown the whole school his embarrassing baby pictures.

Brainstorming. Duncan sat down with his friend looking for ideas. They wrote so many different things down trying to find ideas. Ultimately they were stumped. Duncan searched the internet and got some new inspiration! Five minutes later they sat back down and Duncan had the perfect plan!
Bored Mike. Mike was bored one summer. He had little choice but to stay inside. Mike stepped outside one day. But he realized it was too hot. Mike stayed inside all summer.

Coming or Going?. We were lost in the middle of a new city. We asked a stranger how to get to the town hall. He said to take the 720 bus. We boarded the bus, and rode on it half an hour. That's when we realized we were going the wrong way.

The Investment. Anthony watches a lot of movies about computers. He wished he could impress a venture capitalist to invest in him. After college he designed a website. People were allowed to warn people about other people on this site. A venture capitalist saw the site and offer Anthony one million.

Changing the Sheets. Penelope usually made her boyfriend change the sheets. She just didn't know how to do it. One day her boyfriend got sick with the flu. He ended up in the hospital for a week. She didn't know what to do when she spilled on her sheets.

Free Food. Connor had tried out for a local commercial. He got the part. The commercial was for a diner. As the spokesperson, Connor was given free food for a year. He ate at the diner after over the year.
Vikings. Jake was a viking from Iceland. Jake rode on ships to discover new lands. They would take-over cities. They would gather riches. Jake lived a rich life as a Viking warrior.

Beth wins the lottery. Beth is coming home from work one day. She hears about the power ball on the local radio. She thought she would give it a try. She pays for her gas and a lottery ticket. Later that night Beth watched in amazement as she became a millionaire.

Ferrets. Tom bought two ferrets from a friend. Tom's friend told them they were housebroken. Tom took the ferrets home. The ferrets used the bathroom all over the house. Tom returned the ferrets to his friend.

Honeymoon. Ed and Bee flew to Florida for their honeymoon. They spent their days lazing on the shore. They got great tans! At night they went out to fancy dinners. Ed and Bee had a great time on their honeymoon.

Cheerleading. Brittany decided to try out for cheerleading. She had never cheered before. She practiced every day before tryouts. During the tryout, she did her best and smiled big. She made the squad!

Procrastinator. Emily had a school project that was due tomorrow. She had 2 weeks to do it, but she had not started it yet. She stayed up all night finishing her project. When she got to school the next day, her teacher was out with the flu. She did not have to turn in the project just yet after all.

Wrong Phone. Tim was working with a group. They all had their cell phones in the same area. Tim picked up the wrong one when he went home. It wasn't until the next day that he got a call about it. Tim apologized and swapped phones back.
heavy box. Tom felt weak. He couldn't lift a 50 pound box at work. He wanted to be stronger. He started working out everyday for 6 months. Today, he lifted a 100 pound box at work.

An Old Sword. Max bought an old sword at an auction for fifty bucks. Max later saw a painting of Stonewall Jackson with a sword. Max became convinced the sword he bought was the same in the painting. He took the sword to be assessed by an expert. Max turned out to be right!
Symphony. My wife dragged me to the symphony last week. I tried to enjoy it but failed. I fell asleep halfway through. I snored so loud that my wife had to drag me out. Everyone was upset.

Adopted Friend. Joe was a neighbor who lived two houses down from mine. He had a wife who couldn't have kids. They adopted a little girl the same age as me. Her name was Gloria. We became the best of friends.

Dolores the Therapist. Dolores felt like she was good with people. She decided to get a psychology degree because of her people skills. Dolores studied hard for several years. After she graduated she got a job in therapy. Dolores was proud to use her people skills as a therapist.
Cheesy madness. Arnold hated macaroni and cheese. The taste of it made him throw up. One day his friends dared him to try some. After accepting he took his first bite. Arnold threw up.

Amnesia. Charles was an engineer on a navy ship. He got in an accident near the main engine. Charles was badly injured. He woke up with no memory of what happened. His crew informed him his name was Lydia, and he was their maid.
Stuck Paper. Tom's printer got a paper jam. It really frustrated Tom. He tried to rip the paper out. It wound up damaging the printer beyond repair. Tom's anger cost him a hundred bucks.

Building a treehouse. Daddy brought home a tree house today. We are going to build it together. He teaches me how to use the tools. We put the tree house up in a big tree in our backyard. I played in my tree house all afternoon.

Curtains. Mel and Joe needed curtains for their new apartment. Mel and Joe didn't have money to buy any curtains. Mel searched the apartment for something to hang in the window. All she found was her pillow case. Mel decided to just go without a pillow case.

Typing. Brandy was a fast at typing. Brandy could type 100 words per minute. Brandy decided to challenge her friend to a typing contest. Brandy won the contest. As a reward, Brandy's friend gave her an ice cream.

Bored. Rob wanted to learn computer programming. So he decided to watch lecture videos about it. But they always made him fall asleep. He had little motivation to practice as well. And Rob decided that programming wasn't for him.

Where Eggs Come From. Abby was a city girl. She never thought about where eggs came from. Her class visited a local farm. They saw chickens actually laying eggs. She never thought about eggs the same way again.
Big Fire. Erik put some wood on the campfire. The fire grew bigger. Several people moved their chairs away from the fire. Erik put even more wood on the fire. People complained about the fire.

Laura Does Homework. Laura wants to watch a movie and relax after school. However, he mother tells her to finish her math homework first. Laura doesn't want to work on math, but she eventually agrees. She begrudgingly finishes her math homework. Finally Laura can watch the movie.

Nursery. Jessica thought she was ready for her baby to come. She looked around the nursery, making sure everything was ready. She then noticed that she had forgotten to buy a crib mattress. She went to Target that afternoon to buy one. She was pleased when she learned that crib mattresses were on sale.

Navy. I joined the Navy. I was on rotation in Ecuador. I hated the job so I filed for a request to change locations. My chief petty officer said I wasn't good enough for anything else. That angered me so I hit him and was arrested by the military police.

The Candy Store. There used to be a candy store down the block from where Joe lived. One day, Joe was walking down the street and saw that it was closed. He asked someone who was walking by why it was closed. Joe didn't go there very often, but it was still upsetting. Now that Joe has kids, he has to drive three miles just to get to one.
The Ocean. Bob decided to take the day off of work. He wanted to go to the ocean. He decided to go surfing. He waded out to the ocean on his own. The waves were high and he drowned.

A Day at the Beach. Last weekend we went to the beach. It was an hour long drive to get there. When we got there, it was pretty packed. We found a spot and spent all day there. The kids were exhausted and fell asleep on the way home.

Train Trip. Tom's family was taking a trip. They decided to go by train. They got their own sleeping quarter. The family spent their time eating and having fun. Tom loved train rides from there on out.

Unprepared. Alex realized that the summer was ending and school would start soon. Her school had a uniform requirement and many supplies to buy. Her mom took her and her school supply lists to several stores. Alex couldn't get everything before the school year started. She began the school year unprepared.
Quitting smoking. Will wanted to quit smoking. It gave him a bad cough. He bought a nicotine patch at the store. Used the patch for a month. He finally quit smoking.
The Doctor. I was always afraid of the Doctor. I decided to never go. One day I got very sick. The doctor gave me medicine to help me feel better. After that, i always loved the doctor.

Making a garland. Lily wanted to make a garland for her dad's birthday. She tried a few ideas, but they all broke. Suddenly, she had a new idea. She made a chain of paper loops. Then, she hung them up in the house for her dad.

The bad veggies. Susan was making a soup. She opened the fridge to grab some ingredients. The last thing she was going to grab was the vegetables. Then she saw that they were all brown and mushy. She did her best to cut away the bad parts.

Mixed Mail. Tim had been receiving his neighbor's mail. His neighbor had been receiving his. They would often swap. Tim eventually caught the mailman and talked to him. He apologized and didn't mess up anymore.

Fish Tank. Tim found a fish tank on the side of the road. He picked it up and brought it home. The next day he went to the pet store to get fish. He bought some fish and food. Tim filled the tank with water and put in his new fish.

The Gem Stick. Jim was a gold-panner, who wanted to make it easier. He made sticks that sucked sand from rock cracks on the river bed. He called it the Gem Stick. He showed it to people, who bought them all right away. He became rich without ever finding gold.

Sunny's Pooch. Sunny has had very bad allergies his whole life. When he was a kid he was pretty miserable. He was never able to have any pets and it made him sad. When Sunny was 24 he was able to be on better medicines. He was much better and was finally able to get his first dog.

Salesman. Alex became a salesman at a young age. Electronics were his specialty, despite his lack of experience. His ability to spout facts and figures impressed customers. Given a promotion, he managed inventory based on this alone. His skill as a master manipulator helped him save face many times.

Headed to the movies. Ross had waited for months for the sequel to a movie. Days before it was released he camped out at the theatre. He sleep in a lawn chair. When the tickets were released he was the first in line. Ross watched and enjoyed the movie.

Steve Visits The Aquarium. Steve decides that he wants to visit the aquarium. He gets the day off work so he can go. At the aquarium, Steve sees many beautiful fish. He has a terrific day. Steve is glad that he visited the aquarium.

Lopsided House. Jimmy was building a house for his mother. He wasn't a carpenter but he did all the work anyway. His mother came by to look at the progress. She told him the house was lopsided. Jimmy thought for a moment and then said it was for the rain.

Randy and his Grandfather. Randy was upset to hear that his grandfather was very sick. He went with his parents to visit his grandpa in the hospital. His grandpa was so happy to see Randy, despite feeling poorly. A few days later, Randy's grandpa passed away. Randy was very sad, but happy he had seen his grandpa one last time.

Sore throat. I woke up with a really bad sore throat. I called the doctor and was told to come in at Noon. The doctor looked in my throat and ears, eyes and nose. "You have strep throat, my dear', my doctor said. I had to take antibiotics but felt better after a few days.
Low Patience. Tim was a tutor. He usually had a lot of patience. His latest student really pushed him, though. Tim could not get through to him. He had to give up and get someone else to help him.
The Pets. Amanda hated animals. Her boyfriend had five pets. She was uncertain about how she felt about that. She went to visit him and was horrified. There was pet hair everywhere!

Misha's Mirrors. Misha was obsessed with mirrors. She spent hours in front of one each day. Her boyfriend took her to a crazy mirror house. When she saw herself everywhere she looked she started panicking. Misha will never look at a mirror ever again.

What to Choose. Sally was at a candy store at the beach. There were so many flavors of salt water taffy! Her mom gave her a small bag to fill. She decided to put one piece of each flavor in the bag. That way she got to try everything.

Basketball Match. I experienced difficulty trying to defend my friend. He moved swiftly and faster than me. Before I had a chance to make a shot, my friend grabbed the ball. He was on the other side after a couple of seconds. I began to lose hope of beating him in the match.

Swarming with Flies. My cousin hosted a barbecue at her house. The family prepared food outside of the house. They were often disturbed by the flies. Ian took out a plate of food. When he left to go for a napkin, flies surrounded the food.
Walking and Talking. I just want today to be a restful day. I go visit my friend at her house. We go for a walk. We talk about life. It has been a while since we've done this.

Karen's Misfortune. Karen was a big fan of TV game shows, especially WHEEL OF FORTUNE. She decided to try out to be on it and applied to be a contestant. In the tryouts, she did well in round one and advanced to round two. In round two, the competition was tougher and Karen was eliminated. Karen was disappointed but vowed she would try again in the future.

Game. Ted worked for a large company. His boss offered the top employee free sports tickets. Tom loved baseball and they were baseball tickets. Tom worked very hard all month to earn the tickets. Tom won the tickets and enjoyed himself at the game.

Movie poster. Dawn was looking for a very specific movie poster. She ordered it online hoping it would arrive on time. When she received it in the mail, it was one day early. Pleased, she wrapped it up. And she offered it to her husband the next day for his birthday.

Doored. In 2005 I was doored while biking. A student opened the car door while I was biking. I landed in the middle of the street. A campus policeman was there to help me. I was shaken but not seriously injured.

Starry Night. One night the kids wanted to sleep on the back porch. We laid our sleeping bags and pillows. We spent hours looking up at the stars. Becca was so excited to see a shooting star. The night was calm and quiet.

Andy Learns to Drive. Andy loved long car rides. He asked his parents if he could learn to drive. When he was of age, his parents agreed. Andy put the car in gear and took off on his first trip. He learned to drive very quickly!

Dirty House. Tom's house was filthy. There was food and magazines everywhere. He never had time to clean up. He decided to clean part of the house each day of the week. His house was never dirty again.

Little Rascal. Hannah had decided to adopt a puppy. She visited the shelter on Thursday and selected a tiny poodle. He was very nervous and wouldn't stop shaking. She brought him home and decided to call him Little Rascal. As it turns out, he was quite a mischievous puppy after all.

Jerry goes to camp. Jerry is walking home from school. When Jerry arrives home he sees a man in suit. He asks his parents who the man is. They tell Jerry he is a man from camp. Jerry listens to the man and agrees to go to camp.
Home plate. Ben played baseball everyday. He was Terrible. He always stuck out. He decided to study baseball videos. He got really good and finally made it across home plate.

Broken Copier. It was a busy day at the office. Jim need to make some copies of papers. The copier was broken. Jim called up technical support. Jim had to wait an hour before someone came to fix the copier.
Lost. Matt pulled over, frustrated. His map was so confusing! He had no idea where he was. He went to a gas station and asked for help. He was pleased to find he was only 20 miles out of his way!
The Cat. Tabitha wanted a cat. She loved them very much. But she was allergic. So she took allergy pills. And Tabitha bought a cat the next day.

Volleyball game. Matt and some friends of mine wanted to go to the beach. But when we got there, we found a volleyball. I got the bright idea to have a 3 on 3 match between us. Turns out, that was a bad idea considering we lost badly. But it doesn't matter, we all had fun regardless.

The Pirate Ship. A new park opened in town. It was shaped like a pirate ship. All the kids loved to climb around on it. Josh played on it for three hours straight. Then he went home and took a long nap.
Tutor Girl. Nate was failing a lot of classes. He got a nerdy tutor girl to help him. He fell in love with her. She really helped him turn his life around. Soon they were married.

Bandits. A group of thieves broke into the house. They aimed a gun at the family in order to keep them still. One of the thieves approached the kitchen. He took several supplies, including a purpose. When he ran out, the rest of the thieves followed him.

Signed. Nia thought her cast would make her ostracized in school. But she got a shock. All her friends wanted to sign it! Soon Nia's cast was colorful and cheery. Nia felt so much better about her wound!

No Show Date. Dave was meeting up for his first date with Maria. They agreed to meet at a popular diner downtown at 8 PM. Dave arrived 30 minutes early. Maria never showed up. Dave left after waiting for Maria for 2 hours.

Amazon. Karen was on her first trip to the Amazon. She had always dreamed of seeing monkeys. The team hiked all day and saw all sorts of birds. Karen was disappointed that she did not see a monkey. When they got back to camp, Karen found a monkey in her tent!

Like Old Times. Rick and his dad used to see wrestling matches together all the time. As they grew older, they drifted apart. Then when Rick turned 40, his dad bought him a special birthday gift. It was a pair of tickets to a local wrestling match. The two men enjoyed the match- and their trip down memory lane.

Counting Change. Allison wanted to teach Jack how to count change. She placed a handful of change on the table. She told Jack how much each one was worth. Jack began to practice counting. He learned how to count the change very quickly.

Dave's Music Store. David loved playing the guitar. He decided to attend the music academy, and got a degree. After graduation, David opened a music store. The music store was a big success. David was pleased with his career choice in music.

Having Wine. Kat had poured herself a glass of wine. She was walking to the living room to settle down. The loud bark of a dog outside startled Kat. She dropped the wine glass on the floor. The glass broke and Kat had to clean up the mess.

Jack Instructs His Barber. Jack has had thick healthy hair for his entire life. However, his hairline has receded as he has approached 70. The hair has a central part that has receded the least. He had been combing his hair straight back. Now dissatisfied, he told his barber to make his hair like Trump's.

The Painter. Ellen wanted her new house to have a fresh coat of paint. She looked in the phone book and hired a man that had a nice ad. He came over right away and gave her an estimate. Ellen paid him $1000. He disappeared and she never saw him again!
New scarf. Susan loved knitting. She decided to knit a scarf. When she was done she gave it to her friend. Her friend loved it. She was happy she was pleased.

Water. I grabbed a glass from the cabinet. Then I sliced a lemon and some cucumber to place in the glass. I poured water into the glass. I sighed after taking a big sip. That was a refreshing glass of water.

Hungry. There are many homeless people in Florida. We live in Pasco county, where there are beggars everywhere. They stand on the side of the road on Sundays, hoping to get money. Sunday is the only day it's legal to beg here in Florida. Last week, I gave $5 to a homeless lady, she didn't ask me for money.

No Party Guests. Olivia was hosting her birthday party. She had put a ton of work into the party. She excitedly waited but no guests showed up. Soon she was feeling completely devastated. Luckily she realized she had given everyone the wrong time.

Chickens. Last year we decided to get chickens. We got them as chicks and I raised them. They are so cute as chicks, but so messy! I handled them multiple times a day. Now the chickens come up to us for head-pets!

Melting. The end of 2015 brought the end of my highest weight. I finally had enough and decided to schedule the surgery to fix it. The process went so quickly! Before I knew it I was seemingly already in the post-op recovery room. It's been 7 months and I keep melting away the fat!

Sock escapade. Cam did laundry and couldn't find any socks that matched. He gathered up all the misfit socks and threw them out. He bought 20 pairs of identical socks to replace them. The next time he did laundry all socks were matching. Cam felt great satisfaction about organizing his sock life.

Weight Lifting. I went to the gym to lift some weights. I saw a pretty girl working out. I decided that I would impress her. I struggled to lift twice as much as I normally would have. I learned that I should never try and lift more than I am able to.
The Dog. Alex was crying hysterically. Her dog had been hit by a car. She was the best dog Alex had ever owned! Alex made arrangements to bury her. She was going to miss her dog so badly.

watching tv. I was watching discovery today. I saw several different predatory animals. There were kangaroos fighting each other. One kangaroo kicked another kangaroo. The other kangaroo died from the wound.
The Horse. Ashley lived on a farm. She bought a horse. She didn't know much about horses but they looked fun. She learned how to care for it. She knew it would be a lot of work but she was excited.

Thanksgiving Session Ruined. The family got together today. My mom prepared the Turkey and smoked ham in the oven. It was mostly cooked once everyone got around the table. The oven door wouldn't open all of a sudden. When dad broke it open, the food was burned.
Computer. Tom loved computers. He used them for both work and play. His laptop was old and slow. He decided to buy a new desktop computer. He was very pleased with the fast and great computer.

escaped. Ed came home one day to ride his horse. But he saw that his horse was not in the stable. She had unlatched the door somehow! Ed started to look for her. He was happy to find her in the field, playing!

Eric's Brunch Date. Eric wanted to plan something special for his first date with Kelly. Kelly's friend told Eric that she loved going out for brunch. He called for a reservation at a popular brunch restaurant. They had a pleasant first date and both ate pancakes. Unfortunately, Kelly decided not to see Eric for a second date.

Amber's Halloween. Halloween was Amber's favorite holiday. She just turned thirteen this year. She was disappointed to find out she couldn't trick or treat this year She could still hand out candy to other kids though. She was still happy she could enjoy the holiday.

Bob Goes Sledding. Bob was going sledding down the hill in his backyard. He gained speed the further down he went. He hit a large snow pile. Bob flew in the air! Bob landed safely in a pile of fluffy snow.

Cards. Chrissy wanted to give special holiday cards to her teammates. But there were nine girls and she couldn't afford nine cards! She resolved to make them herself by hand. She went to work with scissors , glitter, pens and glue. The girls were so happy with the sweet cards, they almost cried!

The Vase. Sheena was looking for something new for her china cabinet. She bought a beautiful new vase for it. She put it in the cabinet and added some fake flowers. It was the perfect touch for that space! Sheena couldn't wait for people to see her new vase.
Math. I hated math when I started college. I had always made bad grades in it. I worked really hard at teaching it to myself. I ended up with an A in the class. My classmates were very surprised.

Unjust Justice. The owners of a local restaurant were caught stealing servers' tips. The local TV news crew learned about the story. They descended on the owners with their cameras and microphones. The story aired on the six o'clock news. The restaurant closed, putting the servers out of their jobs.

Well Done. Helga was cooking hamburgers on her grill for friends. She kept the grill very hot to cook them faster. All of the burgers came out well done. None of her friends liked their burger cooked that much. Everyone had a few bites to look polite.
Too Much to Drink. Jane hadn't been out in a while. Her friends took her to the bar. Guys kept buying her drinks. Jane tried to drink them all. She got sick and had to go home.

Elephants. Kellie always loved elephants as a child. At age ten, the circus came to her town, and her mom took her. After the show, there was an extra surprise for Kellie. Her mom had arranged for Kellie to ride one of the elephants! Kellie was so thrilled and joyful, she screamed out loud!

The Writer. When she grew up Kat wanted to be a writer. She was on the school newspaper in high school and college. She graduated college and applied for many jobs. Kat finally landed a job at a large newspaper. Kat was happy and stayed at this position for many Year's.
Boat ride. Chris took his girl on a boat trip. They went to channel islands Park. The ferry ride was an hour. Along the way they saw blue whales. It was the most amazing boat ride.

Ascension. It took us three days to climb the mountain. As we neared the top we found a place to make camp. We layed down our gear and decided to check the view. Above the trees on a rocky hill we stood. The whole valley lay out before us in all its beauty.

Carl Corn. Carl owned a large field of land. He decided to grow crops in his field. He had his friends help him plant corn on his land. He has miles of corn growing on his land. He now sells his corn and splits the money with his friends.

Special B-Day. Will's grandfather had his 100th birthday coming up. Will wanted to do something really special for this event. Will flew his grandfather out from California. Will had as many of his grandfather's old friends fly out too. Will threw the biggest party his grandfather had ever seen!

Bike. Tom and Jerry were riding their bikes. Suddenly the bike wheel fell off of Tom's bike. They were far away from home. Tom and Jerry had to walk all the way back. It was a horrible 3 hours for them.

Jack Goes to the Dentist. Yesterday my seven year old, Jack, went to the dentist. He was really scared on the way there. When we arrived he sat nervously in the waiting room. When his name was called he went with the nurse to the exam room. When he came back, his teeth were clean and there were no cavities!
Vacation. Jenny was more than ready for vacation. Her suitcase was packed and by the door. Tickets were in her purse. The taxi was outside. She'd be on the beach in just a few hours.

Ugly Baby. Jan's mom let her tag along to a shower for a new baby. All the guests were gushing at pictures of the baby. Jan saw the pictures and made a face. Her mom yanked Jan's arm and gave her a look. Jan wondered why she was supposed to pretend the baby was cute.
The Hike. I love to hike. I would hike every weekend. I decided to try a much longer hike. I hiked until I was injured. I ended up hiking for 500 miles.

Honeymoon Rodents. We went to Saint Thomas for our honeymoon. We paid a lot for a luxurious hotel. Our hotel room was infested with large, Caribbean rats. We had to complain multiple times to incompetent hotel management. We finally received a refund.

Mama's Bell Tower. My mother loves clocks that chime. Her house is full of them. She sets them each a little different so she can hear them chime. It sounds like a bell tower during a wedding in her house all day. When I visit I stop them or I'd never be able to sleep at night.

Fire Alarm. We live in a high rise apartment building. One day my wife went to pick up a takeout order. When she got to the building a fire alarm had activated. She could not get back in for a half an hour. By then the food had gotten cold, and had to be reheated.

dicing chef. Billy watched his chef at work cut some carrots. Chef chopped the carrots super fast. Billy was knife skills were slow. He started practicing chopping at home everyday for an hour. In six weeks, he was cutting just as fast as his chef.

Bailey. Bailey was an American cat with identity issues. He dreamed of living in England. One day his master was accepted to Oxford University, She told Bailey he was going with her to college. Bailey and his master moved to England and lived a happy life.

Squirrel!. My dog loves to play in our backyard. Yesterday he saw a squirrel. He took off like a shot after the squirrel. The squirrel squeezed through a hole in the fence. My dog was disappointing he never caught him.

Missed Flight. David woke up early to make his flight. He was pleased because he usually oversleeps. He got everything ready and took a taxi to the airport. When he arrived he was feeling great about his upcoming trip. But when he got to the counter he found he had the wrong flight time.

Tummy Ache. Lucy made herself sick eating cake. The problem was she had stolen the cake. Her grandma was perplexed as to what could have made her sick. Lucy couldn't tell her about the cake. Lucy pretended she had no idea what caused her tummy ache.

Poor Toby. Toby liked hanging out with his friends at night. One night, a friend brought a hot girl over. Toby had met her once before and kind of liked her. Unfortunately, Toby's girlfriend noticed and yelled at him. She wasn't ever invited over again.

Escape From Spanish Camp. At the age of 12, my mom sent me to Spanish camp, and I escaped! Me and a friend wanted to sneak into town for pizza and games. We climbed out a cabin window late at night. His sister and her boyfriend picked us up on a dark country road. We ate pizza, played arcade games and climbed back through the window.

beautiful. Anna wanted to lose weight and straighten her hair. She also wanted to clear her skin and grow three inches taller. Then she saw a program that encouraged viewers to love themselves. Anna realized she had hated everything about herself. From then on, she made a pact to love herself just the way she was.

Rufus Rides the Bus. Rufus hasn't seen his best friend for three Year's. He decides it is finally time to visit his best friend. Rufus takes the long bus ride to Pennsylvania. When he is reunited with his best friend, Rufus is happy. He decides he will never go so long without seeing his best friend.

Time Goes. Shiko was a young boy. He wanted more than anything to grow up. He waited impatiently year after year to get older and older. Eventually, Shiko was on his deathbed. He realized that he wasted his time wanting to grow up.

Dirty Sheets. Tom noticed his bed was starting to smell. The covers were too big for his washing machine. Tom had to take them to the dry cleaners. They were able to clean them up for him at a reasonable price. The smell was replaced with a more pleasant one.

Apple picking. Claire went to the orchard to pick some apples. After an hour, Claire collected two grocery bags full of juicy apples. Claire drove home to begin cleaning the fruit. She used the apples to cook a homemade apple pie. Claire couldn't believe how delicious her pie was.

Popcorn Problems. Bill put a pot of oil on the range to heat up. He added kernels of popcorn. The popping started slowly then escalated. Soon the popcorn was raising the lid of the pot. He had put too much in so it was overflowing.

Peachy. My  father was coming to visit. I wanted the stay to be pleasant for him. I went to the store looking for his favorite drink. I found it at a gas station. I went home feeling proud of the peach soda I had found.
Missed Trip. Tom's family was going on vacation. A day before the trip Tom became ill. He had a bad case of the flu. The family decided to cancel their vacation. Tom felt really bad about it.

Christmas Vacation. The Jones family decided to take a road trip this year for Christmas. Their first stop was in Georgia to see their uncle Frank. They stayed with him for a day before moving on to Tennessee. There, they saw their grandma and grandpa. They finished the trip in Virginia before heading home.

Carlsbad Caverns. I went to Carlsbad Caverns with my friends. We were standing in the quiet cave with some other tourists. Then, we heard a loud smack and a child crying. He had fallen down on the path! I laughed, and then I felt like a bad person for laughing.

Man from peru. There once was a man from Peru. He dreamed he was eating his shoe. He woke up right in the middle of the night. To find that his dream had come true. He then decided to go eat something.

Garbage Day. John forgot to take the garbage out two weeks in a row. The garbage piled up on the side of the house. The neighbors called the police to complain about the garbage. The police came and talked to John. John had to remove the garbage and pay a fine.

The Trip. The couple was taking a romantic honeymoon. They were going to Italy for a week. They couldn't wait to eat pasta and drink wine. They took lots of pictures of their experiences. It was an amazing trip!

Gingerbread. Otis wanted to make a dessert. He decided on a gingerbread house because of the season. He baked the gingerbread house sides and roof. Colorful candies were frosted to the house. Otis ate half the house before the end of the day.

Stepparent Blues. Robbie's parents were divorced. He did not like his mom's boyfriend. When they announced they'd be getting married, Robbie was upset. His mom went through with the wedding anyways. After the wedding, he convinced his dad to let him move in with him.

My Best Friend. I had a swimming party at my house one summer. I invited over lots of different girls from school. They all came to the party, except one. She showed up with her parents, because they wanted to meet me. We quickly became best friends that summer.

Soda. Kai drank a lot of soda one night while watching TV. Then he went to sleep - later than usual. But he had trouble, like his parents had warned him. The caffeine in the soda kept him up, like they'd feared. Kai vowed never to drink soda before bed again!

Home is best. My husband told me I had to leave the house for a week. I stayed with a friend. At my friend's place, there is no heat. I became ill. Next time my husband tells me to leave, I will refuse.

Indirect Attack. The teacher announced today's lesson. Before teaching, she asked the class if they have any questions. Ben was the first person to raise his hand. A few seconds past and the teacher didn't do anything. Once Bethany raised her hand, the teacher picked her to speak.

Two More Books. Gina went to Walgreens with her Grandpa. She was looking for new books to read. They didn't have much that she would like. A lot of their selection was romance novels. She ended up with a two horror novels from well known authors.

Late Mail. Lee has a lot of family members that live far away. Every year Lee has to mail their Christmas gifts. One year Lee waited a week before Christmas to send the gifts. All of his family received their gifts days after Christmas. Lee was disappointed and never vowed to send their gifts much earlier.

Daily Walk. I take a daily walk every single day. I usually take the same path each time. I decided to take another path this time. I saw a bunch of shiny objects scattered in the grass. The objects turned out to be quarters, which i took and went home.

The Big Date. Mark asked Lorraine out on a date and she accepted. He made reservations at a nice restaurant. On the day of the date, he picked her up at 7:00 PM. They had a nice dinner and then went to a movie. Mark even got a kiss goodnight at the end of the evening.

Giving up Tinder. Peta just ended a 15 year relationship. She has decided to start dating. So she turned to Tinder and made an account. After just 1 month she decided that Tinder was not for her. Peta canceled her account and gave up on Tinder as a dating source.

Conference call. The sales team was told to be on a conference call Friday morning. Candace had thought the team was in trouble for poor sales. To avoid the verbal abuse she called in sick. The sales team was told of a one day sales contest. Candace missed out on the contest because she called off sick.
New Additional. Josh and Liz had wanted a baby. They had been trying for a few months. They had not had any luck. One day, Liz took a test. She was pregnant and could not wait to tell Josh.

Eggs. Our chickens lay eggs. They like to find a secret nesting place. Sometimes they all lay in the same place. They change their nesting place from time to time. It seems as though they like to make us hunt for their eggs!

Hurricane Gloria. The family lived in Connecticut. Hurricane Gloria was supposed to go through Connecticut. The day came and Gloria hit Connecticut hard. The husband came home from work. The family went for a drive to see all the damage.
Train. I took my son to Europe. He said he wanted to go on a train. I agreed to take him on a train. I booked two tickets for a train from Spain to France. My son had a great time on the train!

Bad weather. Sally had planned to go for a run. The weather said it was going to be sunny. She got home and changed into her workout clothes. As she got onto the running trails, the bottom fell out. Sally now plans for the unexpected.

party all night. Sue had been working eighty hour work weeks. She was tired of always working. Her friends took her to a party on Friday night. They stayed up all night laughing and dancing. Sue felt so much better about life after having some fun.

Fallen. I was at an elementary school awards assembly. They called my name up. As I was walking to get my award, I fell hard! I was so embarrassed, but got up and kept going. I heard about the fall for years after that!

Jake buys a car. A man named Jake needed a new car. He looked on craigslist and found an affordable one. He contacted the seller and made plans to meet him. He arrived, and traded cash for the car. He got into the car and it was in pretty good shape.
Chile. I was fired from my job. I decided to travel before looking for another job. I decided to go to Chile. I loved Chile! I decided to stay in Chile and teach English.

Restaurant. Bill went to a restaurant with his girlfriend. Bill ordered a steak. Bill ordered the steak rare. Bill was upset to see the steak was overcooked. Instead of complaining Bill simply ate the steak.

Jasper Uses Air Conditioning. Jasper's roommates have told him to stop using the air conditioner. He likes to turn on the air conditioner to stay cool. However, they say it is too expensive. Jasper ignores their complaints, and uses the air conditioner anyway. Eventually, his roommates ask him to move out.

Training for a Race. Samantha was training for an obstacle course race. She set up a mini course in her backyard to practice. Samantha struggled with rope climbing. She practiced everyday until she could do it well. Samantha set a record for rope climbing during the race.

Better with Glasses. Bobby loved to play baseball. Unfortunately he was not very good at bat. His coach suggested he get his eyes checked. He wasn't seeing the ball well because he needed glasses! He was a much better player once he got his glasses.

New apartment. William moved into his first apartment one day. He did not have any furniture and needed to get some. He looked online and found a man giving away free furniture. He drove to the man's house and happily took the new items. When he got home, he furnished his house and it looked great.

The Unnoticed Costume. Molly was a girl who liked to read books. She especially liked to read fantasy novels about princesses. Once, she dressed up as a character from her favorite fantasy novel. She thought she would get lots of compliments on her beautiful dress. But nobody seemed to notice that her clothes were out of the ordinary.

100 lb. weight loss. Rochelle was always a heavy girl every since she was a small child. She was always happy and said she felt comfortable with her weight. One day her husband said she was too fat and found her unattractive. The next day she left her husband and started to diet and exercise. Six months later Rochelle lost 100 lbs and filed for divorce.
New Game. Tom was excited for a new game coming out. He made sure to pre-order it. The game was terrible. Tom was severely disappointed. He never pre ordered another game again.
The Diploma. Leah worked hard for years. She finally got her diploma! Her family threw her a big party to celebrate. Leah hung the diploma on the wall. She felt so successful!

The Leftovers. Sam felt so hungry. All day her stomach growled. She went home and found a delicious looking cake. Of course she ate it and realized there was mold on it. She was sick and had to go to the hospital, never to eat cake again.

Catsup. We ordered take out last Friday. My daughter and husband ordered steak and cheese subs. They ordered one with and one without catsup. The order came with catsup on both. They called and had a sub delivered without catsup.

Nervous Edna. Edna felt nervous and jittery most of the time. She also drank several cups of coffee every day. A friend suggested that the coffee was making Edna jittery. Edna tried decaffeinated coffee, but still felt jittery. It turned out that Edna was just a nervous person.
Bob Gets Contacts. Bob was tired of wearing glasses. They always fell off his face. He went to his optometrist. He ordered contact lenses. Bob loved his new contacts.

Sleep Over. Amy and her friends had been watching movies for hours. They were now hungry. They made a pizza, popcorn, and grabbed other snacks. The girls walked back to the living room toting lots of food. Lynn's mom remarked the girls looked like ants hauling their bounty.

Carl. Carl is a truck driver. Carl delivers gasoline to gas stations. His job is very risky and his wife worries about him very much. One day he is involved in an accident. Carl dies tragically due to a fire.
Deep Cut. Jan cut her finger while chopping food. So she went to put a band aid on the cut. But there was too much blood. Jan drove to the hospital. And doctors were able to stop the bleeding.
produce. Ellen was sick of paying too much for veggies. She planted her own seeds. She tended the sprouts every day. Soon she had a small garden of veggies. Ellen didn't have to buy them anymore!

Cats. Tom went to the zoo with his friend. He looked at every animal. His favorite was the wild cat. He spent a lot of time playing with the cat through the fence. He filmed is zoo experience with the cat and had fun.

Hair Cut. My husband's hair was getting really long. I suggested to him that he cut it. However, he was uninterested, as he wanted to grow his hair out. One day at work, his boss suggested that he cut his hair. That evening, Ben came home with a fresh, new haircut.

Anaconda. Amanda recently took a trip to the zoo. Amanda was really excited, because she wanted to see the animals. Amanda however, was not prepared to see a large snake, an anaconda. Amanda screamed because she never saw a snake so big. Amanda really enjoyed the zoo, but she will never forget the anaconda.

The Surprise. A couple wanted to surprise their three children. They had decided to give the kids a puppy. They told them to sit on the floor and close their eyes. They brought the puppy in and set him in front of them. The children were overjoyed.

View from the top. The man in the fire tower leaned against the side. He saw smoke arise from the east. He put raised his binoculars to get a better look. The more he looked the stronger the fire seemed. THe man gasped in horror.
A pair of shoes. Ron lived in a homeless shelter. He lived with his mother there. He need to go to school that fall. His mother said you need new shoes. Ron knew his mom had no money he was sad.

Video Store. Sally owned a video rental store. For the years the store was successful. However, over time, less people shopped at Sally's store. She decided to take a poll to find out why. Her poll revealed that Netflix had stolen many of her customers.

food fight. Alan walked to the cafeteria for lunch. There, he ran into a few of his buddies. They playfully started a food fight. But soon other students had joined in, and it was chaotic! The principal reprimanded Alan for his role in the food fight.

A Better Lunch. Amy had been in junior high for a week. She had met quite a few people. But she still had no friends in her lunch period. Amy talked to a girl while in line to get food. The girl and Amy decided to eat together since they were both alone.

Counterattack. Germany has not been doing well since D-Day. They decide to make a stand in the Ardennes forest. They attack the Americans for an entire month. Finally the Americans break through. The Germans are on the run again.

ADHD. Jim had trouble paying attention his class. And his doctor diagnosed him with ADHD. He was given prescription medicine. But it only made him very anxious and depressed. Jim ended up failing school.

The Inept Football Team. Tom was a lifelong Oklahoma Football fan. In the 1990's, the team was inept. They could not even get 11 men on the field for kick-offs. Tom prayed for one more national championship before he died. Oklahoma got a new coach and won the championship in 2000.

Lego Designer. Paula loved to build things. She played with Legos every day. She loved to build houses and tall towers. She spent a whole evening building a palace. She pretended she was the princess that lived in it.

The Dining Set. Shane wanted to get rid of his dining set. He posted pictures of it on his social media. Many people saw Shane's dining set. A woman decided to buy the set from Shane. She drove up and picked up the set from Shane's house.

New Shoes. Jane's son was a preteen and growing quickly. Jane noticed her son was walking oddly in his shoes. She thought his feet must hurt in the shoes. She checked and his toes were at the front of the shoes. Her son didn't like his new shoes but Jane forced him to wear them.

Wife. Martin's wife was out late one night. Martin messaged me because he was bored so we talked. He told me that he was actually worried about his wife too. I told him there was nothing to be worried about and that was all. A few moments later his wife came home and he was ecstatic.

The New Garden. Toby had just moved into a new house and the yard needed landscaping. He decided he would try to take up gardening. It took him a week to set up the land and build the garden. When it was finished, he immediately began planting. To his delight, he had blossoming plants within a few weeks.

Angela 4. When Angela turned 18, she ran away from home. Her father was very strict with her. She wasn't allowed to have her boyfriend at his house. One day he came home and spanked her for him being there. She ran out the back door and never went back home.

School Board Victory. Paul, a retired teacher, decided to run for the school board. He was running against several wealthy business owners. Paul honed his message and focused on his life experience. The teachers rallied to support their passionate colleague. Paul won a seat on the school board.

Coffee Break. Anton bought a coffee machine for his convenience store. He installed the machine himself. He messed up on the plumbing. When he turned on the machine hot water sprayed out. Anton closed the store for the day.

Portia Plays Badminton. Portia had always wanted an outdoor game to play with her kids. Her husband and she argued over what game they should play. Finally they bought a badminton set for their backyard. Her kids loved the new game! Now Portia and her family play badminton every weekend.

Veronica's Bush. Veronica had planted the rose bush when her husband died. For going on a decade, she had tended to it daily. The kids thought it would be funny to pour gasoline on it. They set it on fire and laughed as black smoke clawed the sky. Veronica cried from her porch, too shocked to even call out for help.

Mom and the Car. Jeff needed money to buy a car. He decided to mow lawns for the summer for five bucks per lawn. He walked around his neighborhood everyday to promote his business. Within two months Jeff had raised over six hundred dollars. His mom was happy with his work ethic so she helped pay for the rest!

Breaking the laptop. Allie was holding her laptop. She reached for a cup of water. Suddenly, she knocked the cup over. The water poured onto her laptop. Allie checked and discovered that the laptop wouldn't turn on.

Jane's Diary. Jane kept a diary through most of her life. Unfortunately, Jane lost the diary while out for a walk. Years went by with Jane missing her diary and all she wrote within. John found the diary one day while clearing brush from under a lamp. He delivered the diary to Jane and was rewarded with a hug.

The Basketball Game. Rory's basketball team had just beat the record for most losses. The whole team felt discouraged but the coach told them to keep trying They practiced for many hours each day. At their next game, they worked hard as a team. At the last second, Rory shot the ball to win the game!

No More Swimming. Joanne's family rarely used the swimming pool anymore. She got tired of closing it and opening it every year. Her husband never really like the pool. One Fall day before closing, Joanne said he could fill it in. He filled it with dirt and no one misses it.

Luscious. Luscious Look was a male stripper. He was paying his way through college on the funds. One night a woman asked for some one on one time. Look obliged, and took her back to the champagne room. She paid him five grand to listen to her complain about her husband.
Talking Smack. Tom was a good boxer. He talked smack to hype up his fight. He went out of his way to get attention. Tom wound up getting knocked out badly. Everyone loved making fun of him.

Illness. Alice was very sick. She wasn't sure where she had caught her illness, but it was bad. She went to the doctor and he gave her some antibiotics. She took a pill every day until they were gone, just as she was told. She was better in short order thanks to following the directions.
The Hat. Nancy was going hiking. She brought a hat to keep the sun off her face. As she started walking, the hat blew off her head. She chased it down the path. She didn't want to lose that hat!
Pilot. I was flying to Tampa. The stewardess announced the pilot was sick. She asked if anyone on board knew how to fly a plane. I said I did. I flew us safely home.

Shopping. Chariot decided it was time for some new clothes. She got online and started searching through her favorite stores. She picked out a few tops and shoes. She placed her order. Chariot can hardly wait for her new clothes.
Password Woes. Ellen's password wouldn't work. The site instructed her to change it. She entered a new one. The site said she couldn't use it. Turns out, it was her old password!

Haunted. I could not sleep at night. I kept hearing a scratching near the closet. I thought my house was haunted. I went to the closet to hear the scratching better. It turns out it was just a lost mouse.
Sam's Tomato Plant. Sam wants to grow a tomato plant Sam cuts open a tomato, to find many seeds. Sam plants the seed in a pot. Sam waters the seedling every day. Sam now has a tomato plant!

The empty theater. Max was seeing a movie with his girlfriend. They entered the theater and realized that it was completely empty. They could sit wherever they wanted. They decided to sit at the back. They enjoyed the movie even more thanks to the privacy.

Dandelions. It is spring time and the grass is turning green. This is also the time that the dandelions come out. I went to the store and bought weed killer. I spent time going all around the yard spraying the dandelions. Now I have green grass with yellow flowers.

Purse shopping. My mom wanted a new purse and she drug me along with her. We arrived at the mall and started looking around. Eventually she decided on a Coach purse. We looked in the store and she picked one out. She ended up buying one and we drove home.

Meg's Field Day. Meg's big brother died in a car accident. Her parents were so depressed they seemed to forget about her. At the school field day, she was paired with an older boy. He taught her to fly a kite and introduced her to the older girls. They'd all known her brother and they made it a special day for her.

The New Car. Danielle bought a new toy. It was a really fancy car. She drove it fast through the neighborhood. Danielle took it to her friend's house to show it off. Everyone was impressed with the new purchase.

Troubled Child. My niece has three children - 18, 12, and 9. The 12 and 9 year olds have behavioral issues. One day my niece called her mother, B. The 9 year old had punched a hole in the wall. B told her daughter to get the child into therapy.
Making Tea. Naomi's grandmother came to visit her. Her grandmother liked tea. Naomi made muffins and brewed some tea. Her grandmother came, and they sat down for tea. It was an enjoyable visit.
Too loud of a vacuum. Susie bought a new vacuum. She bought it at target. But when she started to use it it was far too loud. She couldn't hear herself. So she had to return it.
Ear Buds. I bought a pair of Earbuds at Target. I spent ten dollars. Someone told me they were cheaper at the Dollar Store. They were only a dollar. I wish I had known that before.

The Rookie. Jack was a rookie on his baseball team. He had little experience but was eager. One game other players got injured and he got more play time. Jack did very well and impressed everyone. He was given more play time from then on out.

My Trip. I was going to a different state to visit some friends. I asked my mom to drive me to the airport. She agreed so we got in the car and were on our way. When I reached the airport we said our goodbyes and I got out. After I got on the plane I called her to tell her everything went fine.

Sylvia's Change of Opinion. Sylvia never took much interest in the armed forces. In fact, she was actually somewhat anti-military for most of her life. After retiring, Sylvia was offered a part-time job. She accepted this job driving Army recruits for entrance processing. Since then, Sylvia has more favorable opinions about the military.

actor appearance in show. Dan was waiting for the new episode of his show to come out. The show would have one of his favorite tv personalities featured. Dan tuned in to the show when it played that night. He was happy to see the performance of his favorite actor. It was interesting to see the actor play a new role.

The Party. Tina had taken five jello shooters. She was now dancing at the party trying to attract a cute boy. She was so tipsy she slipped and fell. As she fell she knocked her head into the coffee table. Tina never woke up from her coma.

Setting Up Her Sister. Courtney thought her younger sister Molly needed a boyfriend. Courtney talked Molly into going out with a guy from work. The guy came over one night and took Molly for a drive. Molly was bored by the guy because he never shut up. That was the last time Courtney set Molly up.

Prom Pals. Lily had nothing to wear to prom. She called her best friend Kalynn to go shopping with her. They went to five different stores. Kalynn liked the red dress the best. Lily purchased the red dress to wear to prom.

The Artist. Brandon was an artist. He enjoyed drawing futuristic landscapes. A movie production company saw his paintings and hired him. Brandon painted several of the backdrops for a new movie. Brandon's backdrops were well-received and he made a lot of money.

The Acorn. A squirrel checked out the back yard. He saw an acorn on the deck. He snuck up to it and snatched it. He took off running just as the dog inside spotted him. He scampered over the fence with his new acorn.

Yo yo. Sally liked to yo-yo. She was very good at it. She was doing it one day when it happened. The yo-yo broke off its string and flew across the room. It hit her pet cat which now stays far away from Sally.

Best intentions. Kelley felt sick. She wanted to go to the party but was not up to it. Yet, because she felt obliged, she went anyway. All of the sudden she got sick on the dance floor. Kelley was very embarrassed.

The hostage situation. Maria was at the grocery store. Suddenly, she saw a man grab a young girl. He held a knife up to her and demanded some things. No one knew what to do to keep the girl safe. Luckily, someone grabbed the guy from behind and freed the girl.

Crystal Chandelier. Nancy walked into the party room. She stopped for a minute to gaze into the chandelier. She also decided to stay beneath it. After a few seconds, one piece of the chandelier broke. It eventually fell on Nancy's back.

The Wheelchair Death. I was in a coffee shop working on the computer. A man in a wheelchair rolled in and began harassing customers. What we didn't know was that he was suffering a major brain aneurysm. Before he could be kicked out, he began to go into convulsions. He died within minutes, and we were all shocked.

The Gift. Mary needed to buy a gift for her mother's birthday. She drove to the store and began to look around. After looking for a while, Mary could not decide what to buy. She eventually found a gift card and purchased it. Mary gave the gift card to her mother, who liked the present.

Pokemon Go. Caleb listened as his friend babbled on about Pokemon. Caleb told him that he was in his 20's now and didn't care about that. The next day, Pokemon Go was released. He was walking to class, when he saw all of his friends in a group. They told him they were playing Pokemon, and Caleb was left in shock.

Past Ghosts. Ron and Hermione reunited for the first time in a decade. Ron complimented Harmony on how fit she'd stayed. Harmony noted how dapper Ron looked. The old friends shared a quiet cup of tea. They sipped their drinks and watched the storm rage outside the cafe.

Using a Coupon. Kate loved using coupons. She always found great deals. Last week she gathered a bunch and went to the store. She bought several items and barely paid any money for them Kate was happy with the deals.

Gift. John wanted to buy something special for his wife. He didn't have enough money. He asked his boss if he could work overtime. One of his coworkers couldn't make it so his boss said yes. John bought his wife the gift with his extra money.
PIE. I went shopping with my grandmother today. We bought lots of fruit. But the apples were my favorite. She cut them up, and baked a pie with them! The pie was delicious.

Driving on the highway. I loved to drive my car around town. However I was afraid to drive on the highway. The cars went too fast on the highway. One day, I was running late and decided to face my fear. I drove on the highway and everything turned out fine.

The Holiday. Grace had been learning French for years! She wanted to book a holiday to France to test her language skills. She booked two weeks in Paris and was quite nervous about it. When she went she found she was able to talk to people really easily. Grace has already booked another holiday to France for next year!
New Job. Beth hated her job. She finally decided to apply for new positions. She got an interview for her dream job. It went very well. Beth got an offer and quit her old job.

Gym Error. Will decided he needed to toughen up. He signed up with a gym that had free weights. Will began to do a bench press with heavy barbell. The bar slipped, Will dropping it on his chest! Will decided perhaps he was tough enough, never returning to that gym.

Best Friends. Sandy has been best friends with Sam for 10 Years. Sadly, Sam died in a car accident. Sandy was so heartbroken at the loss of her friend. Sandy  decided to visit Sam's mother for comfort. Sandy felt comforted once Sam's mother prayed with her.

Road Trip. My friends realized we had nothing to do after lunch on Saturday. We decided to take a road trip. Erin had never been to New York. We drove to New York. We drove back the next day so we could make it back for school.

The Don Becomes King. The Don loved his country very much. But the Don saw his country wasn't great anymore. So the Don decided to become King! The Don fought many enemies and finally triumphed! With the help of his friends the Don made his country great again.

Time Capsule. Ava wrote her future self a letter. She drew some pictures for herself, too. Then she buried them all in as shoebox in her yard. Twenty Years later, she went back and dug them up. She read through her old letters and reminisced happily.

Starbucks. Starbucks is Kim's favorite place to get a coffee. Her husband thinks she is crazy to pay so much for it. She likes to socialize with the workers. Her trips to Starbucks isn't just about getting coffee. Everybody knows her there and they are like friends.

The Refund. Kay was shopping and forgot to use her coupons. This was the 2nd time she had forgotten and decided to get a refund. She waited 10 minutes at the service desk. The cashier took her coupons and gave her $4 in return. She decided she would always get her refund if she forgot her coupons.

Medal. My 98 year old neighbor got a medal last week. He was a soldier in the US Army during WW II. He was part of the forces liberating France. His neighbor worked for the French government and got him a medal. We took photos with him wearing the medal.
The Parade. One day the Jones family went to a local parade. They had lots of bands. They also had magnificent floats. People handed out free hot dogs. Everyone had fun.

Cindy goes out. Cindy has a boring life. She never goes out to party or drink. One night one of her friends takes her out to have fun. Cindy gets all dressed up and goes out. Cindy has the time of her life on the dance floor.

The Author. Ed's dream was to be a published author. He sent in many manuscripts to different publishers. Every time, his work was rejected. He decided to try one last time to get published. On his last try, the publisher finally accepted his work!

Paris. Lee was visiting Paris on a class trip. She loved art so she saw lots of museums. Then she decided she had to visit the most famous museum of all. She took a bus to the Louvre museum and spent all day there. Lee was very impressed with all the artwork she found there!

Wedding Troubles. Leighton was helping her friend pull off her dream wedding. Things were going well until it began to rain. Leighton was freaking out before she had a bright idea. She moved everything under a nice awning with a good view. The wedding proceeded near the gentle rain and it was lovely.
Great date. Lisa went on a date with Lewis. She was excited to go on it. When the two met at the restaurant it was great. They had amazing chemistry. Lisa wanted to be with him again.

Javier Wears Cleats. Javier wanted to join his friends playing soccer. However, he needed a pair of cleats to play. Javier bought a used pair for a good price. He wore them for his first game of soccer. Javier was happy that he could play soccer with his friends.

Pizza place. Mike bought lunch for john. The next day Mike expected John to pay for lunch. John told Mike that he wouldn't buy Mike lynch. The two argued about it for an hour. John and Mike decided to buy their own lunch moving forward.

The Bike. I once had a green bicycle. I was a very nice bike. I couldn't let anyone ride it though, even if I'd liked. It made everyone sad that they couldn't ride my bike. Eventually i got a new bike so  that people could ride it.
Harry. There once was a boy named Harry. His father had a bad drug problem. It made him get very angry. Eventually he got himself clean. When he was clean he was nice.

Ruined Vacation. Tom went on a cruise. He got sick the first day on board. The rest of the trip was spent throwing up in the bathroom. Nothing he took made it better. Tom never went on another cruise again.
